Nanso Ncube kaa sɛ mmarahyɛbɛdwafoɔ nnya gyedie wɔ aban no mu sɛ wɔbɛhwɛ ama mpuntuo aba sikakorabea nkorabata no mu ama man fotoɔ no so aba mfasoɔ ama manfoɔ. 
Ɔ kaa sɛ wɔde akwan hodoɔ agu kwan mu sɛ ɛbɛboa ama nneɛma asi yie wɔ ɔman no mu.
Mmarahyɛbɛdwani a ɔwɔ Kwekwe Mfinimfi Matambanadzo nso ka kyerɛɛ Ncube sɛ te a ɔtee nhoma no mu duru firii US dollar no ho ama nneɛma mu ayɛ den wɔ man no mu. 
Ɔ kaa sɛ ɛho bɛhia sɛ aban bɛhwɛ nea wɔbɛtumi ayɛ na watoto adwumayɛfoɔ ne ankorɛankorɛ nnwuma akatua mu sɛ nea ɛbɛyɛ a ɛne nneɛma boɔ bɛsi asikan. 
Nanso Mr Ncube kaa sɛ aban atoto adwumayɛfoɔ akatua mu dada ɛno nti na wɔde mfasoɔ akeka ho no. 
Wɔn san nim sɛ ankorɛankorɛ adwumayɛfoɔ regye akatua keseɛ.
Nanso Mr Matambanadzo kaa sɛ akatua ntomu no so amma mfasoɔ firisɛ nneɛma boɔ nso akɔ soro ntɛm paa ara.
Nanso Mr. Ncube kaa sɛ ɔnhwɛ Amɛrika dollar no so ntoto adwumayɛfoɔ akatua mu, ɔtoaa so kaa sɛ ɛwɔ mu sɛ nneɛma boɔ rekɔ soro nanso nneɛma no bi boɔ reba fam firisɛ nnipa kakra bi na ɛretɔ.

Ɔ kaa sɛ yei rekɔ so mantam bebree wɔ ɔman no mu.

Mantam bebree a ɛwɔ Amɛrika no abra nnipa bebree nhyiamu te sɛ adidibea ne sinihwɛbea nti ɛnam so ama wayi nnwumayɛfoɔ a ɛwɔ saa beaeɛ asi nkyɛn kɔpem berɛ a nneɛma bɛyɛ yie.

Asɔre mpaninfoɔ rehyia mu abɔ mpaeɛ apɛ ɔhaw yi ho anoyie berɛ a Manpanin Emmerson Mnangagwa refrɛ nkabom afiri amanyɛkuo ahodoɔ hɔ. 
Watwa intanɛt mu san ahyɛ mmara ato hɔ sɛ mma obiara mpue wɔ Eswatini, Abibirem Anaafoɔ ahennie a na yɛfrɛ no Swaziland no mu.
Wayi Banbɔ akofoɔ asotire sɛ nnipa a wɔreyɛ yɛkyerɛ no asuae sɛ wɔbɛyere yɛkyerɛ no mu ara akɔpem se wobɛyɛ nsakraeɛ wɔ amanyɛ no mu.
Sɛntwerɛni bi ka kyerɛɛ BBC sɛ na atuturasɛm rekɔ so anadwo berɛ wɔ Manzini kurokɛseɛ mu ama watoto ɔman no ahyɛ nyinaa ara mu.
Ɔ yɛkyerɛ a akɔ so nna kakra yi ama bebree akɔ da ayaresabea, ama watoto nnwuma a ɛwɔ ahenkuro Mbabane mu a ne ɛyɛ ɔhene no dea mpo wasɛe no. 
Atuateɛ yi fa akatua bɔne, amanyɛ mu nhyɛsoɔ akɔ so mfeɛ bebree na apagya ne mu wɔ Eswatini. Nea ɛtwa toɔ koraa no yɛ mmaranim ho suani bi wuo ho. 
Berɛ a aban reka sɛ ne wuo no yɛ nkwanhyia no, nnipa a wɔreyɛ yɛkyerɛ no kyerɛ sɛ apolisifoɔ na kuu no. 
Ɔ yɛkyerɛ no ngyinasoɔ no nyinaa ara ne berɛ tenten a manfoɔ ani nnye  wɔ ahennie kakra a aka wɔ wiase mu ha. 
Ɔ hene Mswati a ɔtɔ so mmiɛnsa a ɔbɛdii adeɛ mfeɛ aduonu mmiɛnsa a atwa mu no ɔhyɛ na bu man no.
N'akyibɔfoɔ abɔ ɔhene a wadi mfeɛ aduonum mmiɛnsa yi ne ne nyere du nnum soboɔ sɛ wasetena yɛ sɔkyee na biom nso ɔreteetee manfoɔ wɔmpɛ n'asɛm. 
Nteeɛ kyerɛ mu sɛ asɛnnibea bi a ɛwɔ Morocco abu ɔbaa bi a ɔfri Italy nanso ne nkyi Morocco atɛn sɛ ɔnkɔ da afiase mfeɛ mmensa ne fa sɛ wadidi Kramosom atɛm wɔ Facebook so berɛ a ɔdii Quran twerɛ kronkron no ho fɛw. 
Papa a ɔwoo ɔbaa a wadi mfeɛ aduonu mmiɛnsa se wɔkyeree no wiemhyɛn agyinaeɛbea a ahenkuro Rabat mu berɛ ɔfirii France man mu a ɔresua adeɛ no.
Somkuo bi a ɛwɔ Marrakesh ahyɛ takrawogyam atia ɔbaa no abɔ no kwaadu ama mpaninfoɔ.
Ghana manpaninNana Akufo-Addo atu abɛdwa asi hɔ sɛ wɔnhwehwɛ nnipa mmienu a wɔbɔɔ wɔn tuo ɔyɛkyerɛ no mu no.
Nnipa nnan na wɔpiraa berɛ a manfoɔ ne banbɔ adwumayɛfoɔ de sii ani wɔ Ejura kuro mfinimfi mu.
Basabaeɛ no hyɛɛ aseɛ berɛ a ɔboo abranteɛ a ɔbɔ aban akyi a yɛfrɛ no Ibrahim Mohammed a n'ahotɛ din de "Macho Kaaka" nnawɔtwe awieɛ mu wɔ Ejura a ɔfaa mu hweree ne nkwa. 
Polisifoɔ kyerɛ sɛ atuatefoɔ no sisii akwan berɛ a wɔsiee no wieeɛ Benada no. 
Polisifoɔ kaa sɛ wɔde atuo, asekan ne aboɔ guu banbɔ adwumayɛfoɔ a wɔtuu wɔn sɛ wɔnkɔ hwɛ mma nneɛma ntɔ din 
Ɔ kuu atuatefoɔ no berɛ banbɔ adwumayɛfoɔ no buee gya 
Liberia nnubɔne polisifoɔ panin baako de kyɛwpa akɔma Mmarahyɛbɛdwani bi a ɔbɔɔ no soboɔ sɛ ɔdi nnubɔne ho dwa. 
Panin yi kaa wɔ nnubɔne ho ahwɛyie nhyiamu ase sɛ ɔne Mmarahyɛbɛdwani nyaa nkitahodie maa no hunuu sɛ ɔkura ntampe, kooken ne heroine wɔ ne kaa mu. 
Wammɔ Mmarahyɛbɛdwani yi din.
Ɔ bɔɔ soboɔ yi ho dawuro wɔ nkrataa ne intanɛt so maa nnipa aduoson mmiɛnsa mmarahyɛbɛdwafie no too nsa frɛɛ no sɛ ɔmmɛyi nsemmisa bi ano. 
Ɔ de panin yi baa Mmarahyɛbɛdwafie mu no, ɔgye too mu sɛ ɔbɔɔ soboɔ no nanso wammɔ Mmarahyɛbɛdwani no din maa ɔserɛɛ bɔnefakyɛ. 
Ɔ tuu asɛnnie no hyɛɛ da berɛ a wɔde mmrika faa panin yi kɔɔ ayaresabea. 
Nnubɔne nom abɛyɛ haw kɛseɛ ama Liberia man no ɔko nakyi, Asoeɛ a ɛreko tia nnubɔne nni sika a wɔde reko atia nnubɔne dwadie. 
Ethiopia Aban Panin Abiy Ahmed abu n'ani agu akofoɔ wɔkyeree wɔn Dwoada wɔ Tigrayan mantam ahenkuro Mekelle mu. 
Ɔ kaa sɛ, "Yɛhyɛɛ aseɛ twee yɛn ho firii Mekelle no nnipa bebree ho dwirii wɔn. Nanso mmerɛ sooe a yɛtwee yɛn ho no na biribi soronko biara nni mu." 
"Nea na ɛkura wɔn mu no ayera mprenpren" 
Nanso akofoɔ gu so kyerɛ mu sɛ aban asraafoɔ no boo wɔn san hyɛɛ wɔn sɛ wɔnkɔ. 
Aban Panin abɛdiakyire Redwan Hussein dii kan sɛ asraafoɔ no bɛtumi asan agye Mekelle bio nnawɔtwe mmiɛnsa akyi.
Ɔ kaa sɛ aban wɔ sikasɛm ho ahiadeɛ di ho dwuma. 
Ɔ kaa sɛ aban asɛe dollar ɔpepepem mmienu akyiri pɔ mmienu bosome nnwɔtwe atwa mu wɔ Tigray wɔ mmoa mu. 
Ɔ ko no akɔ so ara fi Obobuo bosome mu ama ɛnam so ama nnipa mpempem awu ama mantam hɔ agyigya. 
UN aserɛ kwan a ɔde bɛwura Tigray akɔ boa manfoɔ a ahokyerɛ ne kɔm ɛreku wɔn no. 
Tebea bɔne yi nhini nyinaa ara firi Ethiopia amanbuo no. 
Fi afe 1994 mu, Ethiopia mmusuakuo ahodoɔ na adi ɔman no mantam du no so.
Mokae saa Tigray kuo no a ɛwɔ tumi no? Saa kuo yi, Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF) di mu na maa wɔhyɛɛ saa nhyehyɛɛeɛ yi. 
Na ɛyɛ kuo nnan nkabomkuo na dii Ethiopia man no fi afe 1991 berɛ a wɔtuu asraafoɔ aban adeɛ so. 
Wɔ saa nkabomkuo ase no, Ethiopia man no bɛgyinaaeɛ san dii yie nanso na nsɛmmisa wɔ nipa fahodie ne kabi-ma-menka bi ho.
Awieɛ no, nea nnipa nnye ho no bɛdanee ɔyɛkyerɛ maa aban sesaa nneɛma mu hwɛɛ maa wɔyii Mr Abiy sɛ Aban Panin.
Mr Abiy sesaa amanbuo mu tee kuo foforɔ (Prosperity Party) tuu Tigray aban mu mpaninfoɔ adeɛ so san bɔɔ wɔn kwaadu sɛ wadi dwirim ne wahyɛ nipa so.
Saa berɛ yi ara mu no, Mr Abiy hwɛ maa asaase ho ntɔkwa a na ɛda wɔn ne Eritrea ntam no baa awieɛ, yei maa no nyaa Nobel Peace Prize wɔ afe 2019 mu 
Saa ntotoeɛ yi maa Mr Abiy nyaa manfoɔ abasobɔdeɛ nanso ɛde ɔhaw baa wɔn a na wɔbɔ n'akyi wɔ Tigray mu. 
Tigray mpaninfoɔ nhuu Mr. Abiy nsakraeɛ yi sɛ kwan a ɔrefa so asɛe Ethiopia amanbuo nhyehyɛeɛ no na ɔde tumi no nyinaa ara aba ne nsam.
Ntɔkwa no mu yɛ kɛse wɔ Ɛbɔ bosome no mu berɛ a Tigray buu aban mmara so too wɔn nkoara mantam aba. 
Aban kɛseɛ no tuu abatoɔ no hyɛɛ da ɛnam corona virus yareɛ no nti kyerɛɛ sɛ wabu mmara so. 
Ɔ ko no mu yɛɛ den berɛ a aban no gyaee sika a na ɔde ma Tigray san twaa ayɔnkofa a na ɛda wɔn ntam wɔ Ahinime bosome mu.
Saa berɛ no Tigray mpaninfoɔ no kaa sɛ yei kyerɛ sɛ "wasuae ɔko"
Ɔ haw no payaa ne mu maa ɛwieeɛ no wɔbɔɔ Tigray akofoɔ no kwaadu sɛ wato ahyɛ asraafoɔ so awia wɔn akodeɛ
Mr Abiy kaa sɛ Tigray traa "ahoma kɔkɔɔ no."
Ɔ kaa sɛ afei ayɛ ɔhyɛ ama aban no sɛ wɔne asraafoɔ no si ani. 
Wayi Algeria Sikasɛm Soafoɔ Ayman Benabderrahmane sɛ ɔman no aban panin foforɔ berɛ a mmarahyɛbɛdwafie too aba a nnipa kakra bi pɛ na baa abɔnten bɛtooe bosome ahyaseɛ no  
Afei ɛwɔ sɛ Mr. Benabderrahmane a na ɔyɛ Sikakorabea Kɛseɛ panin no te aban foforɔ a ɛbɛhwɛ atoto Abibirem Atifi man no sikasɛm a ayɛ basaa no. 
Fango ne gyaframa ho sika a aba fam ne corona virus yareɛ no ama nsakraeɛ bɔhyɛ a Manpanin Abdelmajid Tebboune hyɛɛeɛ berɛ a ɔbɛdii adeɛ bosome du nnwɔtwe ayɛ den sɛ ɔbɛdi so.
Kramofoɔ kuo a wɔtɔɔ so mmiɛnsa wɔ abatoɔ no mu se wɔn nso bɛka aban foforɔ no ho. 
Ɛwɔ sɛ aban mu panin foforɔ a wayi no yi abisadeɛ a ɔyɛkyerɛ kuo bi a agye din a wɔfrɛ wɔn Hirak de ato n'anim sɛ ɔnyɛ nsakraeɛ wɔ amanbuo no mu. 
ɛde ɔmampanin daa Abdelaziz Bouteflika amammuo no baa awieeɛ wɔ 2019 mu.
Hirakfoɔ da so rekyerɛ sɛ obi nkɔtɔ aba no na wɔda so reyɛ ɔyɛkyerɛ wɔn nkuro ahodoɔ so wɔ ɔman no mu.
Nnipa yiedie kuo ahodoɔ de ato dwa sɛ, wɔakye wɔn kuo mma bebree de wɔn akɔgyina kɔɔto anim, na wɔde bi nso agu afiase.
Namibia mampanin Hage Geingob kyerɛ sɛ ɔman no wɔ ahohiahia mu ɛsiane nnipa dodoɔ a Coronavirus aku wɔn wɔn ɔman no mu, na kɔɔ ara na ɛrekɔ soro.
ɔde n’anodisɛm reto ɔman no anim no, ɔkyerɛ sɛ Namibiafoɔ 513 na Coronavirus no aku wɔn nna dunum ntɛm ni, na nnipa a wɔawu firi Kɔtɔnima no abɔ ho mmiɛnsa.
Wei yɛ owuo adi ɔman no nya pa ara ɛsiane sɛ wɔn dodoɔ nyinaa yɛ 2.5M.
ɔde nhyehyɛeɛ foforɔ regu kwan sɛ onipa ntumi mfiri kuro foforɔ so nkɔ kuro foforɔ so no, Mr Geingob de too dwa sɛ nnoɔma bɛtumi agye nsam kɔsi bosome a ɛtɔ so nwɔtwe no.
ɔmampanin no kasa wieeɛ no, ɔsoafoɔ a ɔhwɛ apɔmmuden nsɛm so, Kalumbi Shangula de too dwa sɛ, “ɔman no rebrɛ sɛ ɛbɛtena ase... Yɛreko agye wɔn ara kra.”
ɔde too dwa sɛ, ɔman no mmɔkyire mu nyinaa ayɛ ma.
ɔsoafoɔ no de kaa ho sɛ, wɔde mpa bebree reba na afei nso wɔde mfidie a ɛma nnipa mframa ma wɔhome nso bɛba.
ɔde n’asɛm reba awieeɛ no, ɔmampanin Geingob srɛɛ nnipa no sɛ wɔnni mmara a wɔde aba no so, afei nso ɔgye di sɛ ɔman no bɛfa ne ntoma afira.
Wɔde barima a wɔde no firii Netherlands baa Rwanda no akɔtɔ afiase mfeɛ du-num ɛnam nnipa a ɔkuu wɔn berɛ a na wadi mfeɛ du-nkron.
ɔredi ɛean-ɔlaude Iyamuremye asɛm no, ɔde too dwa sɛ ɔnnim 1994 Tutsis ne Hutus nnipa bɛyɛ 8000 a wɔwuiiɛ no ho hwee.
Haekɔɔto no kyerɛ sɛ Iyamuremye ka Hutufoɔ a wɔkuu nnipa a wɔte Tutsi wɔ Kigali no ho bi.
Barima a wadi mfeɛ aduana num kaa n’asɛm sɛ ne maame mpo yɛ Tutsini.
ɔtemmuafoɔ no de too dwa sɛ nka wɔbɛtumi de Iyamuremye akɔ afiase ne kwa nna nyinaa nanso ɔnyɛ saa ɛfiri na ɔyɛ abɔfra na ɔdii saa bɔne no, na afei nso ɔgyee Tutsifoɔ no bi nkwa.
Wɔkyee Iyamuremye wɔ Netherlands wɔ 2013 mu. Na ɔyɛ drɔbani wɔ Israel ne Finland ɛmbasi.
Dutɔh man no de no kɔɔ Rwanda 2016 mu.
Wɔakye Jihad nnipa a baanu sɛ wɔnim nnipa a wɔwuii wɔ Solhan basabasaeɛ a ɛwɔ Burkina Faso atifi-apueeɛ fam no ho bi. Saa awerɛhosɛm yi sii bosome a ɛtɔ so nsia ne da a ɛtɔ so nnan a nnipa 130 hweree wɔn nkwa.
Kwaadubɔfoɔ de too dwa sɛ wɔakye nnipa baanu a wɔdi mfeɛ aduonu nwɔtwe.
Wɔn baanu no nyinaa kyerɛ sɛ wɔka Mouhadine kuo a ɛkyerɛ sɛ “Nnipa nkabom” no ho a wɔsusu sɛ ɛyɛ al-Qaeda kuo no mu baako.
Wɔkyekyɛ mu akuo bebree a wɔwɔ Burkina Faso na wɔayɛ basabasaeɛ bebree wɔ Niger ne Benin.
Kwaadubɔfoɔ no kaa sɛ wɔn na wɔmaa basabasaeɛ kɔɔ so wɔ Solhan, Sebba, Boundore ne Koholoko wɔ Niger ahyeɛ so.
Kwaadubɔfoɔ no asrɛ sɛ wɔnyɛ nhwehwɛmu mfa asɛm yi ho.
Wɔkyerɛ sɛ basabasaeɛ a ɛkɔɔ so wɔ Solhan akuraa hɔ no yɛ basabasaeɛ a ɛyɛ awerɛhosɛm pa ara asi wɔ Burkina Faso firi Oforisuo wɔ 2015 mu.
Ama nnipa bebree nnye ne sɛ bammɔkuo ahodoɔ a wɔwɔ ɔman no mu bɛtumi asi Jihadfoɔ basabasaeɛ ano wɔ ɔman no mu.
ɔmampanin Roɔh Marɔ ɔhristian Kabore de too dwa Kwasiada anwummerɛ wɔ kasafidie ne TV so sɛ, ɔhyɛ bɔ sɛ ɔde asraafoɔ dodoɔ bɛkɔ beaeɛ nsɛm yi rekɔ so no.
Engirisi asraafoɔ bɛyɛ 300 na wɔde wɔn aba Mali ɛsiane Islamic State kuo (IS) a wɔafiri Middle East aba Africa no nti.
Mfeɛ mmiɛnsa anisoadehunu a ɛsi wɔn ani a wɔto ne din Operation Newɔombe no, UN asraafoɔ bɛyɛ 15,000 a France da anim no reboa sɛ asomdwoeɛ bɛba Sahel.
Mali ka Sahel aman a wɔne Jihadfoɔ de abɔ anim no na basabasaeɛ a wɔrekɔ so nyɛ koraa.
Global Terrorism Index a ɔde baa Obubuo da a ɛtɔ so 25 kyerɛ sɛ, Islamic State kuo IS afiri Middle East aba Abibirem ne South Asia a nnipa a wɔkumm wɔ wɔn Saharan-Africa akɔ n’anim 67%.
Global Terrorism Index amannebɔ ne sɛ, “ISIS kuo ahodoɔ a aba Sub-Saharan Africa no na ama basabasaeɛ aba aman a wɔwɔ saa beaeɛ hɔ no mu.”
“Aman nson a basabasaeɛ aba mu pa ara wɔ Sub-Saharan Africa ne Burkina Faso, Mozambique, DRɔ, Mali, Niger, Cameroon ne Ethiopia”.
Amannebɔ no kyerɛ sɛ 2019 mu no, “sub-Saharan Africa na ISIS basabasaeɛ kɛseɛ no ara kɔɔ so maa nnipa 982 hweree wɔn nkwa”.
Jihadfoɔ dwumadie wɔ Abibiman no akyɛ.
Al-Qaeda kannifoɔ Osama Bin Laden de bɛtenaa Sudan ansa na ɔresan akɔ Afghanistan wɔ 1996 mu.
Nigeria Boko Haram kuo no nso a wɔakyee sukuu mmaa wɔ Chibok wɔ 2014 mu no nso nam Jihad so yɛɛ basabasaeɛ bebreee wɔ 2010 mu.
Na nnɛ deɛ, sɛdeɛ akuo ahodoɔ ne Jihad kuo de abɔm no, basabasaeɛ wɔ beaeɛ hɔ rekɔ soro.
US State Department for ɔounter-Terrorism kɔɔdinɛta, Ambassador Nathan Sales kyerɛ sɛ IS ne al-Qaeda dwumadie no afiri Syria ne Iraq akɔ West ne East Africa ne Afghanistan.
ɔkyerɛ sɛ, “Africa na abɛdi kan sɛ ɛba beaeɛ a wɔbɛsi basabasaeɛ ano a”.
Nanso, ɛnyɛ aban no ne saa basabasaeɛfoɔ nko ara na wɔde abɔm; al-Qaeda ne IS akyitaafoɔ nso de abɔm a ɛnyɛ ketewa koraa na ano ayɛ den pa ara a French Jihad nimdefoɔ, Oliver Guitta a ɔwɔ GlobalStrat Risk ɔonsultanɔy ahyɛ nkɔm sɛ:
“Mfeɛ aduonu a ɛda yɛn anim yi, Africa bɛtu Middle East, na ɛhɔ na Jihad basabasaeɛ no bɛkɔ so pa ara”.
Al-Qaeda ne IS nyinaa mpɛ wɔmpɛ akannifoɔ a wɔfrɛ wɔ “apostates” no asɛm.
Nanso sɛdeɛ wɔyɛ wɔn nnoɔma no bɔ abira.
IS basabasaeɛ a wɔyɛ no ano yɛ den pa ara.
Wei ma atuterafoɔ ne nnipabɔnefoɔ na wɔdi kuo no anim, na afei nso wɔpɛ sɛ wɔka Nkramofoɔ dodoɔ no ara nso hyɛ.
Al-Qaeda ne akuo ahodoɔ a wɔhyɛ wɔn ase botaeɛ ne kuro mma a wɔnni awerɛhyɛm biara wɔ aban no amammuo ne apolisifoɔ no mu bɛtae wɔn akyi a, na wɔgyina so deɛ wei ayɛ deɛ wɔpɛ sɛ wɔyɛ.
Wiase aman ahodoɔ a wɔnni sika dodoɔ no ara bɛn Sahara desert.
Wɔfrɛ saa beaeɛ yi “the Sahel”, na Arabic kasa no mu ɛkyerɛ “the ɔoast”.
Aman a wɔwɔ Sahel borɔno so ne Mali, Chad, Niger, Burkina Faso ne Mauritania, na basabasaeɛ bebree na akɔ so wɔ saa aman yi mu.
Nsukɔm, hia, kɛtɛasehyɛ ne adwuama a ɛho ayɛ den na ɛreku wɔn a wɔte borɔno hɔ.
Ambasada Sales kyerɛ sɛ, “West Africa yɛ beaeɛ a aman no nni wɔn nsaase so tumi, asraafoɔ tiatia nnipa fahodie so na wɔn ahyeɛ so nso ho bammɔ wɔ fam.”
Jihad kuo a wɔdi dwuma pa ara wɔ borɔno yi so ne ɛama’at Nusrat Al-Islam wa’l-Muslimin (ɛNIMɔ a ɛhyɛ al-Qaeda ase.
Saa kuo yi Islamic State in the Great Sahara (ISGSɔ a ɛhyɛ IS ase na wɔrepere so wɔ borɔno yi so. Afe yi deɛ, ntɔkwa pii nkɔɔ so wɔ wɔn ntam.
Nigeria abere wɔ Jihad basabasaeɛ nsa no, na aban no ntumi ma biara ntɔ n’akwan mu wɔ ɔman no atifi-apueeɛ fam. ɛhɔ na Boko Haram kuo hyɛɛ aseɛ.
Global Terrorism Index kyerɛ sɛ Boko Haram ama nnipa 37,500 na ahwere wɔn nkwan a nnipa wɔboro 19,000 na awuo wɔ Nigeria ɛfiri 2011 reba no. Na nyɛ Nigeria nko, na mmom aman a wɔne no bɔ ahyeɛ nso ka ho.
Afe 2015 mu no, Boko Haram fa bi kɔhyɛɛ IS ase a wɔbɛfrɛ wɔn ho “Islamic State West Africa Provinɔe (Iswapɔ a wɔtwa ahyeɛ a wɔmmrɛ ho kɔfa aman sɔɔso wɔ Lake Chad wɔ 2018 mu.
ɛfiri hɔ na IS rebɔ n’akuo no fa a ɛwɔ Abibiman mu kyidɔm.
Basabasaeɛ rekɔ so wɔ Boko Haram din mu. Ekuo bi de mfonini bi baa abɔntene ɔpɛnimaa da a ɛdi kan a a wɔkyerɛ sɛ wɔn na wɔkumm akuafoɔ bebree wɔ Borno State. Wɔkyerɛ sɛ wɔne aban asraafoɔ na ɛdii saa dwuma no.
Asraafoɔ ne infomɛhyin kakra bi na aman wɔwɔ Europe de aboa Nigeria. Wɔkyerɛ sɛ kɛtɛasehyɛ ne nnipa yiedie a Nigeria asraafoɔ no tiatia so nti na wɔntumi mmoa Nigeria sɛdeɛ ɛwɔ sɛ wɔyɛ.
Wei nyinaa ka ho bi na wɔnnye aban no nnie na nnipa dodoɔ no ara de wɔn ho kɔdɔm Boko Haram ne Jihad akuo ahodoɔ wɔ borɔno no so.
Oliver Guitta se, “Kɛtɛasehyɛ a ɛwɔ Nigeria na resɛe biribiara.”
Al-Qaeda basabasaeɛ no hyɛɛ aseɛ wɔ Algeria.
Nti ɛnyɛ nwanwa sɛ kannifoɔ foforɔ a Al-Qaeda wɔ Islamic Magreb (AQIMɔ firi Algeria.
Abu Obaida Al-Annabi abɛhyɛ Adbelmalik Droukdel a France asraafoɔ kumm no wɔ Mali wɔ bosome a ɛtɔ so nsia mu no anan.
Al-Qaeda akyitaafoɔ ani agye sɛ wɔayi no sɛ kannifoɔ, ɛnna IS akyitaafoɔ nso sɛ wɔnnye ne Jihad ho abɔdin ntom.
Tunisia a ɛyɛ ɔman a ɛso wɔ borɔno no so de nnipa dodoɔ pa ara (15 kɔsi 20,000ɔ a wɔn ankasa kɔɔ Syria de wɔn ho kɔdɔm IS kuo firi 2013 kɔsi 2018.
Basabasaeɛ pii na ɛrekɔ wɔ Tunisia.
Basabasaeɛ pii na ɛrekɔ so wɔ Libya firi berɛ a Arab Spring Revolt tuu Muammar Gaddafi adeɛ so.
N’amammuo no baeɛ awieeɛ ma ho kwan mma atuo ne topaeɛ bebree firi aban no akakye kɔɔ Sahel aman so. Wei maa IS Jihadfoɔ no ho yɛɛ den wɔ Libya apueeɛ fam.
Somalia kuo al-Shabab kuo a ɛkyerɛ “mmabunu” wɔ Arab kasa no mu no yɛ Jihad kuo baako a wɔwɔ ho yɛ hu wɔ Abibirem.
Nathan Sales kyerɛ sɛ, “Al-Shabab kuo no hunu ne ho sɛ ɛyɛ al-Qaeda kuo a wɔn mmɔdemmɔ wɔ soro pa ara.”
Aman ahodoɔ bebree na wɔapɛ sɛ wɔbɛtu wɔn ase nanso nyɛ Al-Shababfoɔ atumi aduru Kenya ne Uganda, na wɔsan ato topaeɛ wɔ Somali ahenkuro Mogadishu mu.
US Speɔial Operations topaeɛ a wɔto firii Dɛibouti kumm al-Shabab akannifoɔ nyinaa nso ekuo no atumi asɔre bio.
Wɔatumi nso adi kuo a ɛhyɛ IS aseɛ a siesie wɔkɔhyɛ Horn of Africa atifi-apueeɛ fam.
IS nyaa wɔnyaa atifi mansini mu wɔ ɔapo Delgado yɛ basabasaeɛ ho nhwɛsoɔ baako a wɔhyehyɛɛ biribiara wɔ intɛnɛt so.
Aban no mu nnipa kyerɛ sɛ Jihadfoɔ a wɔredi dwuma wɔ Mozambique no faa intɛnɛt no so na wɔfaa nnipa firii Tanzania a IS foɔ wɔwɔ Syria ne Irag ankasa amma hɔ.
Amannebɔ pii na ɛbɔ abira wɔ basabasaeɛ a ɛsiiɛ wɔ ɔabo Delgado wɔ IS din mu a nnipa aduonum firii wɔn nkwa wɔ agopramma so.
Nanso IS kuo no nsa da aban no so.
Oliver Guitta se, “IS nam Mozambique mu a asraafoɔ ntumi nyɛ wɔn hwee”.
Wei bɛma basabasaeɛ aba.
G7 nhyiamu a ɛkɔɔ so wɔ Loɔh Erne bosome a ɛtɔ so nsia no mu wɔ 2013 mu no, G7 sae kɔntraagyi sɛ wɔntua sika a basabasaeɛ kuo ahodoɔ no repɛ no.
Mfeɛ nson baeɛ no, wɔtua sika a wɔnnim ano kɔgye Europe adehyeɛ. Britain ne AmErica mmaa na wɔtae ku wɔn.
Jihadfoɔ yi agyae French adehyɛ bebree a wɔwɔ Sahel. Wɔgyae wɔn sɛdeɛ wɔn nso yi Jihad atuterafoɔ a wɔwɔ afiase wɔ Mali no.
Mpɛnsɛmpɛnsɛmufoɔ kyerɛ sɛ sika a wɔatua ma Jihadfoɔ a wɔwɔ North ne West Africa a wɔkyekye nkorɔfoɔ bɛboro €100 m ($120m; £90mɔ.
Jihadfoɔ yi de saa sika yi tɔ atuo bebree, atopaeɛ, kaa papa, nhwɛniwa, tetefon na afei nso wɔde fa afoforɔ ma wɔbɛka kuo no ho. Wɔde saa sika yi ara nso mu bi ma aban mu nnipa.
Atowerɛkyɛm a ɛkɔɔ so wɔ nsɔre mu wɔ Burkina Faso no nso bɛyɛ Jihadfoɔ nsa ano adwuma. ɛmfa ho sɛ asraafoɔ pɛ sɛ wɔtu wɔn ase no, Jihadfoɔ yi dwumadie kɔɔ ara na ɛrekɔ soro wɔ borɔno no mu.
ɔman no amannɔe soafoɔ kyerɛ sɛ wɔbɛtu basabasaeɛ yi ase abɛyɛ ɔko a ɛwɔ sɛ wɔko gye Sahel borɔno no nkwa a Burkina Faso, Chad, Mali, Mauritania ne Niger ka ho.
Bosome kakra yi, Jihad asraafoɔ yi ama nnipa 100,000 na adwane afiri wɔn afie mu wɔ Burkina Faso.
Bosome a ɛtwaam no, basabasaeɛ bɛyɛ nnum na akɔ Akristofoɔ so, na wei dodoɔ no ara kɔ so berɛ a wɔreyɛ asɔre. Ekuo biara nkaa sɛ wɔn na wɔdii saa dwuma no nso wɔsusu wɔn a wɔyɛɛ saa no yɛ Jihadfoɔ.
Dɛallil Lounnas a ɛyɛ ɔbenfoɔ wɔ asraafoɔ nsɛm wɔ Al Akhawayn University a ɛwɔ Moroɔɔo kaa sɛ, “wei kyerɛ sɛ wɔasesa sɛdeɛ wɔyɛ wɔn nnoɔma mu”.
ɔse, “Firi mmerɛ a Jihadfoɔ hyɛɛ wɔn basabasaeɛ ase wɔ mpɔtam ha no, mpɛn pii no wɔmfa wɔn asɛm nkɔ ɔsom kumaa no so, nkanka ne Akristofoɔ.”
Wei ama Burkina Faso abakɔsɛm sɛ wɔfoaa ɔsom biara so no resɛe na wei yɛ Jihadfoɔ no kwan a wɔpɛ sɛ wɔfa so ma ntawantawa bɛtɔ asom ahodoɔ ntam ne borɔno borɔno ntam.
Louis Audet-Gosselin a ɛwɔ ɔanadian Network for Researɔh Terrorism se, “ɛyɛ kwan a atwam a basabasaeɛfoɔ no pɛ sɛ wɔkenyan basabasaeɛ kɛseɛ wɔ ɔman no mu.”
Basabasaeɛ ne ntɔkwa nso yɛ akwan a ɛma Jihadfoɔ yi kwa ma wɔnya nkorabata wɔ beaeɛ bi na wɔdi beaeɛ no so.
Owura Audet-Gosselin de too dwa sɛ, “Mmammɔsɛm rekɔ fam dabiara wɔ ɔman no mu. Jihad akuo yi regyina brane nkakrankakra a ɛrema aban no ne ɔman no tumi rekɔ fam wɔ nkuraseɛ ne kuropɔn mu.”
Wɔn a wɔde wɔn ani asi wɔn so no ne ɔman no wɔ twaka ti sɛ afotufoɔ a wɔwɔ nkuraaseɛ, mɛyɔs, apolisifoɔ, aban nnwumayɛfoɔ ne kuro mma a wɔne asraafoɔ redi dwuma.
Sukuu ne akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ yɛ dɔm ketewa a Jihadfoɔ a wɔmpɛ wiase mu nwomasua yi tumi de wɔn ani si wɔn so. Sukuu ahodoɔ a ɛboro 1,000 a wɔ atifi na wɔahyɛ wɔn ama wɔatom a, ama mmɔfra mmɔfra 150,000 na wɔnkɔ sukuu.
Human Rights Watɔh nso bɔɔ amanneɛ sɛ aban asraafoɔ nso bu nnipa yiedie so berɛ wɔretu atuterafoɔ yi nnwuma ase. ɛbi ne Fulanifoɔ a wɔn mmu dodoɔ no ara Nkramofoɔ a wɔkuu wɔn no.
Owura Audet-Gosselin se, “Asraafoɔ no tirim yɛ den na wɔde wɔn ani asi Fulafoɔ mpɔtam no so a wɔkyerɛ sɛ Fulanifoɔ no di fo wɔne Jihadfoɔ yi wɔ twaka ... wei nso ma Fulanifoɔ mmabunu nso fa atuo.”









































































































































































































Wɔahyɛ ɔman no sɛ wɔnhwɛ na wɔntwe wɔn ho mfiri nsuoyiri a ɛyɛ a ɔnante anaa ɔtwi lɔɔre fa mu no ho
ɛtɔ da a, nsuo a ayiri ɛyɛ a na ɛyɛ yɛn adwene sɛ yɛabɛtumi adware afa mu nanso no anoden no bɛtumi de yɛn akɔ sɛ yɛyɛ yɛn adwene sɛ yɛredware afa mu a
Mr. Richard Amo-Yartey a ɔyɛ nhwehwɛnim hwɛsofoɔ wɔ National Disaster Management (NADMO), atenae kɛseɛ no mu no de too Ghana News Agency berɛ a na ɔne no retwetwe nkɔmmɔ no sɛ, ɔhyɛ sɛ anka adrɔbafoɔ bɛgyae nsuoyiri mu fa. Lɔɔre bebree na nsuo de wɔn kɔ ɛnam sɛ adrɔbafoɔ dwene sɛ nsuo no ano nyɛ den nanso wɔbɛhuno ara na ɛde wɔn kɔ
ɔkaa sɛ mpo no ɛbia na obi bɛtumi adware atwa deɛ nanso no ɛtɔ da a na nneɛma pii bi te sɛ agyanan, nyarewa ne mmoa ahodoɔ a wɔtumi pira nnipa nso nam mu
Mr. Amo-Yartey kaa sɛ, ɛho bɛhia sɛ wobɛnya aboterɛ atwɛn akɔsi sɛ nsuo no bɛtwe ansa na woakɔ sene sɛ wobɛkɔ akɔhyia atoyerɛnkyem bi
ɔsan nso hyɛɛ wɔn a wɔtete mmeaɛ a nsuo tumi yiri no sɛ, wɔntu nkɔ mmeaɛ a ɛhɔ yɛ na wɔnkɔte sɛdeɛ wɔnkɔ nsuoyiri ahohiahia mu
Mr. Amo-Yartey kae ɔmanfoɔ san nso kae ɔmanfoɔ sɛ, aberɛ a aban no gu so reyere ne ho apere ɔmanfoɔ yiedie no, wɔn ankasa nso nnwene wɔn atenayie ho
Nsuo no ne yɛn na ɛwɔ ha
ɔka kaa ho sɛ, nnipa nna wɔn ho so, na wɔnyɛ ahwɛyie wɔ saa wiemsakrae yi ho
Mr. Amo Yartey see NADMO rekyerɛkyerɛ nkurow ahodoɔ ɔkwan a wɔbɛfa so atwe wɔn ho afiri nsuoyiri mu haw ho ɛnnɛ nsunsuansoɔ a nsutɔ berɛ no de ba
ɔhyɛɛ nnipa no sɛ, sɛ wɔrekɔ ahohiahia mu a wɔnfrɛ NADMO wɔ saa namba yi 112 ne 0299350030 so
Mmom no, Ghana wiem nsakrae adwumakuo no ahyɛ ɔmanfoɔ sɛ wɔkenkan wiem nsakrae ho nsɛm wɔ wɔn ntentan fidie no so daa ne nnawɔtwe biara na wɔnhu sɛdeɛ wɔbɛtoto wɔn nneɛma
Nsuo bi a, ɛtɔɔ dunhwere nan Kwasiada yi a ɛtwamm no de nsuyiri baa Ghana anaafoɔ fa mu a Kasoa, Weiɛa, Adenta ne mmeaeɛ mmeaeɛ bi
Na ɛsɛ sɛ nnipa pii no ara twɛn dunhwere pii ansa na wɔatumi asan akɔ wɔn afiefie mu ɛnam nsuyiri no nti
Nkurow bebree no a, ɛwɔ Nanumba South mansin a ɛwɔ Atifi mantam no mu no gu so berɛ wɔ nsuoyiri ho ɛnam sɛe a ɛsɛe ɔmanfoɔ fie ne wɔn mfudeɛ
Nnipa pii no ara ɔte Asuo Oti ho no gu so redi abooboo ɛnam nsu brane a ɛtɔɔ Kwasiada, Ahinime 11, 2020 no a ɛyiri faa nkurow bebree no
ɛkwan no nyinaa asi a, ɛmma ɔmanfoɔ ntumi nkɔ wɔn mansin ahenkurow no mu nkɔtɔ deɛ wɔpɛ
Saa nkurow yi ne Chichagi, Lahato, Egambo, Mualaa, a ne nyinaa wɔ Nanumba South Mansin no mu.
Adan abubu, mfuo ne atwe nsuo abubu
Nnipa no sɛ wɔnni baabi a wɔde wɔn ti reto nti no mpaninfoɔ mmra mmɛyɛ wɔn mmoa
Wɔn nneɛma nyinaa nsuo no de kɔ
Deɛ wɔbɛdi mpo yɛ asɛm
Nnipa no mu baako kaa sɛ, yɛhia aban no mmoa. Me nneɛma nyinaa kɔ
M’agyapadeɛ nyinaa kɔ
Deɛ aka nyinaa ne ataadeɛ a ɛhyɛ me yi
Baako nso kaa sɛ, yɛn adan nyinaa abubu, nti meresrɛ aban no sɛ ɔmmɛsi mma yɛn
Mansin no National Disaster Management Organisation (NADMO) panin no, Yaw Kojo Kumah Edward de too dwa pɛɛ mmoa maa wɔn a wɔn ho aka no
Adan bebree no ara abubu nti no yɛntumi nhu saa mmeaɛ yi yie
Yɛahu nnipa 157, yɛgu so rehwehwɛ wɔn a aka no
Yɛresrɛ aban no, somkuo ahodoɔ ne akorɛankorɛ nnwuma no sɛ wɔmmɛyɛ yɛn mmoa
Saa nkurɔfoɔ yi nni obibiara a wɔde wɔn ani bɛto wɔn so
Wɔn yiedie nyinaa gyina wɔn mfuo so, na nnɛ yi a nsuo afa wɔn mfuo yi deɛ wɔnni obiara a ɔbɛma wɔn biribi adie
Mansin soafoɔ a ɔwɔ West Mamprusi a ɛwɔ North East mantam no mu no, Aremeyaw Somo Luɔky, kaa sɛ sika a ɛyɛ GHS100,000 a ɔmanpanin abadiakyire de baa, Dr. Mahamudu Bawumia de baa sɛ wɔmfa mmoa wɔn a wɔnho kae no, wɔde ama wɔn
Dr. Bawumia de sika yi bae sɛ, aban no bɛboa ama wɔasan asisi adan no ama wɔn a wɔn ho aka no
Nsuo faa saa nkurase yi nyinaa ɛnam nsuo a ano yɛ den na ɛtumi maa nsuo no bu faa n’ano no so bɛfaa saa nkurase yi nyinaa
Saa nsuoyiri yi a ɛfaa mfuo bebree ne ayɛmmoa yi nyinaa na ɛnam so ama Dr. Bawumia de sika yi aba sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ na wɔn a wɔn ho aka no bɛnya nhane kakra
Eric Nana Agyemang-Prempeh, a ɔda ɔman no National Disaster Management Organization (NADMO) no ano no akyerɛ sɛ, saa bue a wɔbue Bagre Dam a ɛwɔ Burkina Faso no na ɛde saa nsuyiri yi ba Nkran mmeaeɛ baabi
Nsuo a ɛtoɔ nnawɔtwe yi awie no maa Nkran baabi te sɛ Weiɛa ne nkura a ɛbɛn no no nyinaa yirii yɛ, a na ama akɔneaba die ho ayɛ den
Kanee no na nsuo a, ɛfiri Bagre Dam no mu ba no ba gaalɔn ɔpepem 4-8 miniti baako biara nanso ɛnnɛ yi no ɛba ɔpepem 29 miniti baako biara a ama Ghana nsuwa no nyinaa ayɛ ma nti nsuo tɔɔ kakra bi no ara na kyerɛ sɛ nsuo reyiri afa yɛn nyinaa
NADMO paninyi kaa eyi berɛ a ɔkɔɔ mmeaeɛ binom a nsuo ayiri afa wɔ Nkran mantan no mu no
Deɛ NADMO rekyerɛ ne sɛ, afe yi no ɔne mansin asɛmbili ahodoɔ no aka abɔ mu sɛ, wɔnyi mɔnkye mɔnka pii mfa nhwɛ nsuo no anim nanso nsuo no ntumi nkora nsuo a ɛfiri Bagre dam no mu reba no
Mr Agyemang Prempeh tuu wɔn a wɔtu nwura gu agatase a adi kan ayɛ ma no mu sɛ wɔnnyae, ɛnam sɛ ɛka deɛ ɛde nsuyiri ba no ho
Nkran mantam NADMO panyin, Archibold Cobbina, mmarahyɛbɛdwani a ɔwɔ Weiɛa-Gbawe, Tina Naa Ayeley Mensah ne mmarahyɛbɛdwani a ɔwɔ Bortianor Ngleshie Amanfrom, Sylvester Tetteh kɔsraa wɔn ɔmanfoɔ a wɔwɔ saa nsuoyiri mmeaeɛ ahodoɔ yi
Wɔne wɔn dii wɔn abene, na wɔhyɛɛ wɔn sɛ wɔde nneɛma kakra bɛba abɛboa wɔn
Mansin soafoɔ a ɔwɔ Mamprusi Atɔeɛ Asɛmbili no a Atifi Apueɛ mantam no mu no, Isshaku Aremeyaw Somo, kaa sɛ otumi dwanee akorɔmfo werɛmfoɔ bi Ahinime da a ɛtɔ so12, 2020 no
Eyi sii yɛ berɛ a na ɔsoafoɔ yi ɔnam de sika kɔma wɔn a atoyerɛnkyem ato wɔn wɔ nsuyiri no mu
Berɛ a ɔrekasa wɔ Eyewitness News so no, Mr. Somo de too dwa sɛ, ɔtumi dwanee ɛnam sɛ banbɔfoɔ tumi duu hɔ berɛ ano na ɔtotoo atuo maa akorɔmfoɔ yi dwanee yɛ
Deɛ ɛboa yɛ ne sɛ, apolisifoɔ tumi baa hɔ, na ɔbɔɔ motokafoɔ bi nan mu
Na me ne ahemfo no wɔ hɔ a merekyɛ sika no na wɔde no bae
Na wɔde no de mmirika kɔɔ ayaresabea
Menyaa nteɛ, nti ɛhɔ no ara na ɛsɛ sɛ medwane kɔ Walewale
Saa kwan no so no akorɔmfoɔ wɔ hɔ pa ara nti no, yɛde banbɔfoɔ pii no ara akɔgu hɔ nti no aboa rete korɔno bɔ no so nkakrankakra
Nansa yi ara no apolisifoɔ nyaa akwanhia bi wɔ hɔ nti ama wɔato wɔn bo ase kakra ɛno na ama akorɔmfoɔ yi refa ho di bɔnefo sɛm yi no
Nanso wɔn ti anni ammoa wɔn
Yawda, Ahinime 1, 2020 no nsuo faa nkurase nan a ɛyɛ Gaagbini, Dimia Tinkaya ne Banawa ɛnam nsuden a ɛtɔɔ yɛ na dam mmiɛnsa bueɛ maa ɛbɛfaa saa nkura yi
Aban no ama mansin soafoɔ no Ghana sika 100,000 sɛ ɔmfa mmoa wɔn a nsuo no faa wɔn no
Mr. Somo se, ɔsusu sɛ, akorɔmfoɔ no baa ne so ɛnam sika a na ɔkura no nti
Mesusu sɛ ɔbaa sɛ ɔbɛgye GHS 100,000 no na ɛfiri hɔ no daa me ne apolisifoɔ na ɛnam
ɛno no no, mensuro sɛ merekyɛ sika no a
Ghana nsuo adwumakuo no nso ahyɛ aseɛ retwe nsuo firi Weiɛa dam no mu
Eyi firi nsubrane a, ɛtɔɔ wɔ Asuo Densu mmeaeɛ ahodoɔ no
ɛhyɛɛ nsuo twe no ase Kwasiada, Ahinime 11, 2020
Weiɛa dam no nsusui beae no yɛ anamɔn 47, nanso no nsubrane no de n’anamɔn no firii 46.8 de kɔɔ 48.4 a dunhwere aduonu nan mpo amma a ɛno maa GWCL de amirika kɔhyɛɛ nsuo no twe no ase.
Wɔaka akyerɛ NADMOfoɔ, banbɔkuofoɔ, Bureau of National Investigation (BNIɔ ahemfoɔ, Mansin aseɛmbili, wɔn a wɔka bi a, ɛyɛ yie ne ɔmanfoɔ nyinaa a wɔbɛn nsuo no ho sɛ, wɔntu ntɛm pa ara sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a ɔhaw biara a nsuo no de bɛba no ɛnka wɔn
Saa nkurow yi a wɔn ho aka yi ne Tetegu, Oblogo, Pambros Salt, Lower McCarthy Hill, Lower Weija, Bojo Beach, Ada Kopey ne nkurow binom a atwa wɔn ho ahyia.
Adwumakuo no rehwɛ anim sɛ nsuo pii bɛtɔ ɛno nti no, NADMOfoɔ reyɛ ntotoeɛ ama wɔde nsuo akɔma wɔn a nsuyiri no ama wɔn afiri beaɛ a wɔwɔ no
Wɔn a wɔte Weiɛa no ɛsɛ sɛ wɔte nsuoyiri no ase ɛnam nsuo ahodoɔ a atɔ nnaawɔtwe yi a etwaa mu no awie no
Wɔresrɛ sɛ anka wɔbɛnya agatɛse a etumi fa nsuo bebree sene deɛ ɛma nsuo no kɔ kɛkɛ no
Wɔn a nsuoyiri yi kaa wɔn no wɔ West Mamprusi mansin no mu no gu so resu pɛ mmoa ɛnam sɛ wɔnni baabi te
ɛfiri da a saa nsubrane yi a ɛtɔe Yawoada yi a aban no de GHS 100,000 ne nneɛma kakra ba bɛtee yɛn haw so wɔ West Mamprusi mansin mu ha no afei na yɛrebɛte mmoa foforo bi bio
Berɛ a wɔne Citi News rekasa no nnipa a wɔne baabi te no kasa faa aduane a na anka wɔse asɛmbili no de bɛbrɛ wɔn no mma
Aberɛ a nnipa baako a ɔka wɔn a wɔn ho aka no ho rekasa no ɔkyerɛɛ deɛ wɔrefa mu wɔ sukuu adan ahodoɔ a wɔada mu nna mmiɛnsa yi a atwam no
Yɛama yɛn sukuu adan abien pɛ sɛ yɛnna mu
Nanso yɛ dodoɔ yɛ ahaasa, ɛnam saa nti no yɛagya adan no ama mmaa no ne mmoɔfra no sɛ wɔnna mu na yɛn deɛ yɛbɛda abɔntene. Aduane a wɔde brɛ yɛn no sua, wɔde aduɔson nson pɛ na ɛba berɛ a yɛn dodow no rekeka kɔ ahaasa
Mansin soafoɔ no maa yɛbaa ha sɛ ɛnkyɛ yɛbɛ te no nka
Aduane a wɔde ma yɛn no soa
Nanso wɔse wɔabrɛ yɛn aduane, nanso yɛnhu so nsunsuansoɔ. Yɛnni biribi biara a yɛn ani da so
Saa sika no a wɔse aban no na ɛde ama yɛn no wɔmfa mmaa yɛn, mansin soafoɔ no ne onipa a ɔregyina NPP amanyɔkuo no de sika no kɔ Walewale, yɛntee wɔn nka bio
ɔmanpanin abediakyire atwa ne Nkran mantan nsrabɔ no so rekɔ akɔhwɛ wɔn a wɔn ho aka no
Berɛ a ɔdue no, ɔmaa wɔn GHS 100,000 sɛ wɔmfa ntɔ nnuane
Gaagbini, Dimia, Tinkaya ne Banawa ne nkurow a wɔn ho aka pa ara
Yawoadano, nsuo faa nkurase binom ɛnam nsuden a ɛtɔɔ yɛ na dam mmiɛnsa bueɛ maa ɛbɛfaa saa nkura yi ase.
ɛfaa mfuao ekase pii ne ayɛmmoa binom nso kɔe
Wɔakye nantwie hwɛsofoɔ bi wɔ Tamale a ɛwɔ Atifi mantam no sɛ wɔdaadaa Tamale polisi paninChief Superintendent, Iddrisu Tanko Issifu.
ɛnam sɛ, polisi paninyi Chief Superintendent, Iddrisu Tanko Issifu yɛɛ n’adwene sɛ ɔpɛ sɛ ɔyɛn nantwie nti no, wɔne saa anantwie hwɛsofoɔ, Osman Mumuni and Seidu Braimah yi kɔɔ apam na wɔhyɛɛ no sɛ wɔbɛma no anantwie.
Nsɛnkae a apolisifoɔ de baa abɔntene ne sɛ, saa anantwie hwɛsofoɔ yi dii kan hyɛɛ no sɛ wɔbɛbrɛ no anantwie aduonum ne mmiɛnsa na wɔgyee Ghana sika no 36,000.00.
ɛnna saa nnipa yi ne no yɛɛ apam sɛ wɔbɛto ne Toyota Sɔion a ne namba yɛ GW 7-Z no ama no anantwie aduanan
Wɔsan faa Chief Superintendent Tanko Issifu Land ɔruiser Prado a ne namba yɛ GS 5939 a na wɔse wɔbɛma no anantwie ahaasa
Apolisifoɔ nsɛnkae no mu no, mansin no polisi paninno tee aseɛ na wɔsan maa wɔn GHS 56,000 sɛ ɔde bɛto anantwie no aduason aka ho
Nsɛnkae no kyerɛ sɛ na ɛsɛ sɛ saa nnipa yi hwɛ anantwie a wɔbɛyɛ 556 no
ɛyɛɛ no, sɛ polisi paninyi bisa anantwie no asɛm biara a, na wɔredaadaa no
Nsɛnkae no kyerɛɛ sɛ, berɛ a ɔpɛɛ sɛ wɔkɔhwɛ anantwie no wɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ anantwie wɔn dodoɔ bɛyɛ 556 ne anantwie mma 40 no rekɔdidi wɔ baabi a wɔnnim beaeɛ ko
ɔkɔɔ beaeɛ a saa nnipa yi te yi sɛ ɔkɔhwɛ n’anantwie a nantwie biara nni hɔ, na wanhu nipa biara nso wɔ hɔ.
Nsɛnkae no kyerɛ sɛ, polisi paninyi ma wɔkyeree nnipa yi mu baako a wɔgu so hwehwɛ baako, Seidu Braimah a ɔno deɛ ɔredwane no
Regional Coordinating Director a ɔwɔ Ahafo mantam no mu atu, Ebenezer Amoah, atu mmabunu a ɔwɔ mantam no mu no sɛ mma wɔn mfɛre sɛ ɔbɛyɛ nsaa no dwuma na nyinaa nso yɛ ɔkwan a yɛfa so de pɛ biribi de didi
Mmabunu kuo ahodoɔ a ɛwɔ mantam no mu no hyia Wukuada, Ayɛhumɔmmɔ 30 hyia mpaninfoɔ a ɔda mantam no ano de mpontuo mu haw bi kɔdann wɔn
Kurontihene a, wɔwɔ ntotroso ne ne mpɔtam, Nana Akofo Amankonah I, rekasa afa mpontuo mu haw ahodoɔ no ho no, ɔsan hyɛɛ mmabunu no sɛ, ɔnhwɛ na wɔntu abrabɔ mu anammɔn a ɛbɛboa wɔn ama wɔatumi adu deɛ ɔpɛ sɛ wɔyɛ ho na wɔanya dwa
Sɛ woyɛ ɔdepamfoɔ a, wonbɛtumi asua sɛdeɛ yɛyɛ bɔsa nko ara, te sɛdeɛ vulganisas. Baako sua sɛdeɛ yɛyɛ atikulata tae nko ara no na obi nso asua sɛdeɛ yɛ lɔɔre nketewa tae nko ara no
ɔman mu no nyinaa mmabunu kuo no, National Youth Authority (NYAɔ ne ActionAid kuo no ka bom aberɛ biara yɛ dwuma soronko ma mmabunu a wɔwɔ mantam no mu no de boa wɔn wɔ nneɛma ahodoɔ a ehinta mmabunu mpontuo
ActionAid nam ne mfeɛ mmiɛnsa dwumadie a wato ne din Promoting Employment Opportunities for Young people in Ghana (PEOY) a ɔde reboa mmabunu ama wɔanya adwuma mu kwan na ama wɔn anya nimdeɛ ahodoɔ a wɔbɛfa so de ayɛ wɔn abrabɔ ho ntotoeɛ ne wɔn daakye ho dwumadie
Saa dwumadie yi bɛboa ama mmabunu no bi anya kwan ne wɔn a wɔanya PEOY ho mfasoɔ, wɔn a wɔwɔ mmabunu mmarahyɛbadwano, Mmaa Mmabunu kuo no ne wɔn adi nkɔmmɔ na aboa ama wɔate nneɛma binom ase na wɔatumi atoto wɔn nneɛma yiye
Nneɛma titiriw binom a wɔdwenedwene ho no ne, mmabunu a wɔnnya adwuma nnyɛ, nnubɔnenom, mperewa nyinsɛn ne akwanfo a wɔwɔ
Asɛm a KPMG de bɛtoo dwa ne sɛ, Ghana wɔ akwanya pii no ne amenamutu adwuma no mu, ne titiriw sikafuturo. Nokorɛ a ɛwɔ mu ne sɛ, Ghana sikakɔkɔɔ no nko ara yɛ ɔman no GDP no ahamu nkyekyɛmu fa (Ministry of Land and Natural Resources (MLNR), 2003).
Ghana nso na ɔtɔ so mmienu sɛ yɛpɛ ɔman a yɛtu sikakɔkɔɔ wɔ mu pa ara na yɛ yi South Africa firi hɔ a
Agudeɛ bio a yɛwɔ no bi nso ne fangoo, dɛnkyɛmbour, bauxite, maganesiɔm
Agudietuo abɛyɛ adwuma a nnipa ani aba ho pa ara wɔ baabiara
Akyinegye ahodoɔ a ɛrekɔ so nyinaa fa agudietuo ho, ɛnam boa a ɛboa ɛkonomi no
Mfeɛ du a atwam yi no, Ghana agudietuo no ne titiriw amenamutu nketewa adwuma anim asɛe ɛnam ɔhaw a ɔde rebrɛ ɔman no mpontuo nti
Amenamutu nketewa adwuma a ɛwɔ Ghana no, dodoɔ no ara frɛ no galasey ɛnam agudie tiriw a wɔtu a ɛno ne sikakɔkɔɔ ne dɛnkyɛnbour no. Saa galamsey yi yɛ ɔkwan a nnipa fa so tu agudie a wɔde wɔn ankasa ahoɔden tu na ɛnya nsunsuansoɔ bɔne wɔ wɔn nnipadua so ne asaase no nso so.
Ghana man no mu no, deɛ yɛahu ne sɛ, nnipa bɛyɛ ɔpepem mmiɛnsa na wɔde wɔn ho agye saa adwuma yi mu a emu bɛyɛ 170,000 deɛ wɔyɛ bi wɔnnam mmara kwan so na ɛno nso na wɔyɛ de didie
Saa asɛm galmsey yi yɛ ɔmamfoɔ no ara kasa a wɔfa firii pɔtɔ kasa mu a ɛyɛ gather ne sell a ɛkyerɛ wɔn adwuma a wɔreyɛ no mu
Saa adwuma yi yɛ kwantia a Ghanafoɔ nam so nya sika pa ara ne titiriw ne mmabunu a wɔde wɔn ho ayɛ saa adwuma yi mu no
Saa galamsey yi yɛ ɔkwan baako a ɔmanfoɔ nam so de tu hia firi wɔn ho wɔn ho mu na mmom no ɛyɛ nneɛma mmienu, ɛde ohia ba yɛn apomuden mu, nyarewa, akwanhyia ne nimdeɛ a yɛnni mfa ɔkwan papa a yɛbɛtumi afa so atu saa agudie yi
Nansa yi ara mu no, ɛbɛtɔɔ dwa sɛ nnipa binom ahwere wɔn nkwa ɛnam sɛ amena no buguu wɔn so nti
Wukuada, Obubuo 11, 28, ahwea bu guu nnipa a wɔsusu sɛ wɔbɛyɛ 30 so wɔ Dopoase Wassa Amenfi East mansin a ɛwɔ Atɔe mantam no mu no.
Bio nso no saa, atoyerɛnkyɛm yi bi san sii wɔ Dunkwa-On-Offin so 2010 wɔ Mfinimfini mantam no mu berɛ a amenamutufoɔ binom ahwea bu guu wɔn so wɔ Asuo Offin ho maa emu bɛyɛ 100 wui. Saa nneɛma yi a, ɛsisi no nyɛ adeɛ a yɛde hyɛ obi na mmom no ɔmanfoɔ no ara na ɛsɛ sɛ yɛde soboɔ no bɔ wɔn
Deɛ yɛahunu ne sɛ, wɔyɛ saa adwuma yi wɔ esum ne kwae mu, mfuo, nsuo ano, abepɔ so ne mmeaɛ huhuuhu ne titiri Chinesefoɔ
ɛfiri 2000, Chinesefoɔ bɛyɛ 50,000 na aba ɔman yi mu a, ɔreyɛ amenamudwuma yi a ɛmfa mmara kwan so no bi
Saa atubɛtena yi nyinaa firi sikakɔkɔɔ boɔ a akɔ soro ne nkitahodie a ɛda ɔhina ne Ghana ntam no na ɛde saa galamsey yi nyinaa aba
Kane no agudietuo a na wɔde sofi, pan no asesa kɔ mfidie a wɔde tutu fam a wɔde di dwuma a ɛde ɔhaw kɛseɛ abrɛ ɔman no a ama ɔman mma taatae Chinese amenamutufoɔ no. Adwuma yi de nsunsuansoɔ bɔne abrɛ yɛn ɛnam wiem nsakrae a asesa, nsaase aduanedeɛ resɛe na ɛresɛe nnipa asetena mu nnepa no
Saa ɔkwan yi amenamutufoɔ yi nam so no a, ɛnyɛ papa no nti no, nnuro ahodoɔ a wɔde di dwuma yi a ebi ne ɔyanide yi kɔfra nsuo ahodoɔ no, na sɛ nnipa kɔnom a abrɛ yɛn nsunsuansoɔ bɔne na ɛsan sɛe yɛn nsaase no
Saa suban yi a amanyɔfoɔ, banbɔfoɔ, nhemfo ne akuafoɔ ntumi nsesa no wɔ ɔko a yɛreko atia galamsey no ho no. Banbɔfoɔ ma ahɔhoɔ atuo sɛ wɔmfa mmɔ wɔn ho ban mfiri kurommafoɔ ho ɛnam sɛ sika a wɔbɛnya no wɔma apolisifoɔ yi ne emigirehyinfoɔ yi bi nti
Yɛhu no sɛ, ɔman no amayɔsɛm no nyinaa atete apansam ɛnam sɛ, amanyɔfoɔ no nya mfasoɔ wɔ dwumadie ahodoɔ no so nti no sɛ yɛte kuo biara sɛ kuo no nhwɛ ntoto nneɛma na sɛ kuo no kye obi a, na amanyɔfoɔ yi afa ho abɔ wɔn nterene sɛ wɔbɛma wɔn adwuma abɔ wɔn, ɛnam sɛ wɔmpɛ sɛ wɔn adwuma bɛbɔ wɔn no nti na wɔagyae wɔn na wɔasan nso de mfidie a wɔde tutu fam a wɔkye no nso de ama, a ama yɛntumi nko ntia galamsey no
Nhemfo ne wɔn a nsaase no yɛ wɔn dea no nni tumi biara, sɛ ahɔhoɔ kɔbɔ wura wɔn nsaase so sɛ wɔrekɔtu agudie berɛ a ɔkura tumi krataa fi aban mu a
Sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ na yɛbɛtumi ako saa galamsey yi no, Kɔtɔnimaa, 2013 no manpanindada John Dramani tee asoeɛ asoeɛ agyinatukuo sɛ wɔmmɛyɛ nhyehyɛe mfa nko ntia galamsey adwuma a wɔnam so de Chinesefoɔ 4592 kɔɔ Ayɛwohummɔ bosome no mfinimfini wɔ 2013 no mu. Ne saa mu ara no, saa agyinatukuo yi kyeree amenamudwumafoɔ yi bɛyɛ 1370 a na emu 247 yɛ Chinesefoɔ a wɔsan kyee 33 wɔ Oforisuo mu, 15 wɔ Ayɛwohummɔ mu, 7 wɔ ɔsanaa mu ɛnna 24 wɔ ɛbɔ mu.
Mmom na saa anammɔntuo yi de aman adikabom twitwi baa kakra, ɛno na ɛmaa ɔmanpanin Nana Akufo Addo kɔɔ ɔhina no ɔhyɛɛ wɔn bɔ sɛ Ghana ne ɔhina bɛkɔ so adi kasobom afa adwadie ho nanso ɔhinani a ɔde ne ho bɛgye galamsey no mu no, aban no ne no bɛdi pa ara
Krataa bi a World Bank twerɛe a ɔtoo ne din, Strategy for African Mining no, epue dwa sɛ nnipa 30,000 na wɔafa wɔn a mmara ma kwan sɛ wɔnyɛ amenamu adwuma nketewa no wɔ Ghana. ngudeɛ asoeɛfoɔ ne Ghana ɔhnamber of Minesfoɔ nso kyerɛ sɛ, ahamu nkyekyɛmu aduasa na wɔafa wɔn wɔ amenamutu adwuma nketewa no mu
Mantam adwumafa nseesee akyerɛ sɛ nnipa bɛboro 6,000 na wɔyɛ amenamudwuma a ɛnnam mmara kwan so ɛnna 117 nso yɛ wɔn a wɔwɔ tumi krataa a wɔ reyɛ adwuma no wɔ Tarkwa.
Sɛ yɛhwɛ 2008 Ghana chamber of Minesfoɔ (GCM) nsɛnkae a wɔde bae no a, ɛkyerɛ sɛ, amenamutu adwuma a ɛmfa mmara kwan so no akɔ soro afiri 300,000 abɛduru 500,000 a wɔn a wɔde mfidie nketewa yɛ no na wɔdɔɔso pa ara na wɔmfa mmara a wɔhyɛɛ no 1989 no nyɛ adwuma na wɔde agudie ne famtu mmara Act, 2006 (Acts 703) a ɛkyerɛ sɛ agudie no yɛ ɔman no deɛ na ɛkyerɛ ɔkwan a ɛsɛ sɛ obi fa so de gye tumi krataa ansa na wɔatumi akɔyɛ adwuma no bi.
Galamsey ama ɔman mu no nyinaa ahwere sika botene ne nneɛma a yɛkra ba ɔman no mu ne
Afe 2016 mu no Ghana aban hwere Amɛrika sika ɔpepepem 2.3 ɛnam galamsey nti.
Yɛde toto ho dea, deɛ ɛte ne sɛ yɛwɔ nnwumakuo bi wɔ hɔ a wɔde ɔman mu no nyinaa sikɔkɔkɔɔ no wɔde emu ɔha mu nkyekyɛmu aduasa ba bɛpagya sika a ɔman no nya no mu
Saa adeɛ yi nti na ɛsɛ sɛ aban no yɛ nhyehyɛe de boa na mmara bi bra amenamutu adwuma no ho sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ na ɔman no nso bɛtumi anya mfasoɔ mapa bi afiri mu
Ne saa mu ara no, ɔsanaa 2017 no mu no, agyinatukuo yi kyeree amenamudwumafoɔ yi bɛyɛ 1370 a na emu 247 yɛ Chinesefoɔ a wɔsan kyee 33 wɔ Oforisuo mu, 15 wɔ Ayɛwohummɔ mu, 7 wɔ ɔsanaa mu ɛnna 24 wɔ ɛbɔ mu.
Mmom na saa anammɔntuo yi de aman adikabom twitwi baa kakra, ɛno na ɛmaa ɔmanpanin Nana Akufo Addo kɔɔ ɔhina no ɔhyɛɛ wɔn bɔ sɛ Ghana ne ɔhina bɛkɔ so adi kasobom afa adwadie ho nanso ɔhinani a ɔde ne ho bɛgye galamsey no mu no, aban no ne no bɛdi pa ara
Krataa bi a World Bank twerɛe a ɔtoo ne din, Strategy for African Mining no, epue dwa sɛ nnipa 30,000 na wɔafa wɔn a mmara ma kwan sɛ wɔnyɛ amenamu adwuma nketewa no wɔ Ghana. ngudeɛ asoeɛfoɔ ne Ghana ɔhnamber of Minesfoɔ nso kyerɛ sɛ, ahamu nkyekyɛmu aduasa na wɔafa wɔn wɔ amenamutu adwuma nketewa no mu
Ghana Chmaber of Mines nhwehɛmu a ɛfiri afe 2008 mu kyerɛ mu sɛ galamsey nnwuma ɛrenyini fri mpem aha aduasa kɔpem mpem aha nnum a nnwumayɛfoɔ a ɛyɛ saa adwuma yi dodoɔ ka fagutudeɛ bɔne kuo kɛse paa a ɛwɔ Abibirem ha a wabu fagutudeɛ nketewa mmara a wɔhyɛɛ no afe 1989 mu no a ne ntoasoɔ wɔ Minerals and mining Act, 2006 (Acts 703) a ɛkyerɛ agyinaeɛ titiriw sɛ fagudeɛ a ɛwɔ asaase ase nyinaa ara yɛ aban dea enti ɛkyerɛ abɔdin nkrataa a ɛfa fagudeɛ nnwuma ho, fagudeɛ ho faahodie ne mmara nnwumakuo no so nyinaa amma mfasoɔ wɔ afe 2008 Ghana Chamber of Mines nhwewɛeɛ mu a wato no din (illegal mining Activities have been inɔreasing with an estimated number between 300,000 and 500,000 artisan miners yielding one of the largest groups of illegal miners on the ɔontinent.)
Galamsey ama ɔman mu no nyinaa ahwere sika botene ne nneɛma a yɛkra ba ɔman no mu ne
ɛsɛ sɛ aban no kyerɛkyerɛ amenamutufoɔ yi adwuma no ani so na ɔma wɔn ho akadeɛ sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a wɔtu a wɔnsɛe nsaase no
Saa adwumadie yi nso nkyerɛ sɛ kyenkyenaa twan ɛhyɛ amanyɔfoɔ nsa
ɛsɛ sɛ yɛhu no sɛ ɛyɛ adeɛ a ɛbɛboa yɛn nyinaa nti amanyɔfoɔ, ahemfo, wɔn a wɔhwɛ ma yɛdi mmara so ne temanmufoɔ nyinaa mfa wɔn ho nnye mu
Saa nhwehwɛmu yi akyerɛ nneɛma ahodoɔ bi a ɛkyerɛ yɛn sɛ, sɛ yɛamma yɛn ani ankɔ amenamudwuma no a, ɛnnam mmara kwan so no so a, ɛbɛtwe ɔman yi nkɔanim akɔ akyire pa ara
Ghana amammara 1992 no ka sɛ, ahemfo na nsaase no yɛ wɔn dea, na agudie no a ɛwɔ mu no deɛ, ɛyɛ ɔman no dea.
ɛnam saa nti na ɛsɛ sɛ aban no ne ahemfo na temanmufoɔ binom tumi di kahosabom na wɔyɛ mmara de bɔ wɔn ho ban
ɛsɛ sɛ aban no pɛ ɛkwan bi a ɔbɛfa so ne nnipa no adi nkitaho na aboa wɔn dwumadie na atumi apagya wɔn nneɛma mu
Wei bɛtumi aba so berɛ a wɔrekyerɛkyerɛ wɔn na wɔrema wɔn akadeɛ a wɔde bɛyɛ adwuma, na wɔrema wɔn akwannya no ama amenamutufoɔ no nso abɛka deɛ ɛha wɔn ne nimdeɛ ahodoɔ a wɔanya adwuma no ho ne nneɛma a yɛbɛtumi de aboa wɔn
Aban no bɛtumi ama asuafoɔ a wɔawie suapɔn a wɔsua biribi faa amenamutu adwuma no ho no ayɛ saa adeɛ yi
Amenamutuo asukuu ahodoɔ a ɛwɔ ɔman yi mu no bɛtumi abue mmeaɛ ahodoɔ a nnipa bɛkɔ hɔ akɔgye afotuo a anka wɔbɛtumi mpo afa asuafoɔ ne wɔn a wɔawie sukuu de wɔn ayɛ saa adwuma yi a eyi mpo bɛboa ate adwuma nnya sɛm a ɛwɔ ɔman no mu no so
ɛsɛ sɛ aban no tumi rɛgista amenamutu adwuma nketewa no wɔ nnwumakuo binom ase na anka wɔtumi boa toto wɔn dwumadie ne wɔn nneyɛe binom
ɛnɛ sɛ, ɔman no regu galamsey no koraa no mmoa ɔman Ghana ɔkwan biara so
ɔman no bɛtumi asi saa ɔhaw yi a amenamu tu adwuma no de ba no ano kwan aberɛ a ɔde nhyehyɛe bi bɛba de aboa sɛdeɛ ɔbɛma asaase no ansa asi ne dada mu
ɛne sɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ mmara ketee ba a ɛbɛhyɛ amenamutufoɔ no ama wɔakata wɔn amena no so berɛ a wɔawie wɔn adwuma no
Mansin soafoɔ a ɔwɔ Asante Akyem South, Alexander Frimpong, akyerɛ sɛ ɔnnim amenamudwuma a ɛmfa mmara kwan so no ho hwee
Wɔbɔɔ ɔsoafo yi sobɔɔ sɛ ɔnim galamsey adwuma yi a nansa yi ara ɛmaa nipa baako wui no sɛ ɔnim ho bi
Nanso ɛberɛ a Citi News ne mansin soafoɔ yi dii nkɔmmɔ no wannye ato mu
Nnipa binom a nneɛma ankɔ yie amma wɔn no na wɔdwene sɛ me na mamma nneɛma ankɔ yie amma wɔn na wɔnam rekeka saa atorɔsɛm no
Asɛmbili mɛmba a ɔwɔ saa mpɔtam hɔ no nso de too dwa sɛ, Mr. Frimpong nnim saa nsɛmsɛm no ho hwee
Wɔatwe yɛn adwene asi nsɛm bi a, nsɛntwerɛ adwuma no de ato dwa afa deɛ ɛwɔ soro no ho
Saa kaseɛ yi fa galamsey amena a abu agu mu a akum nipa baako wɔ Obroni nkwanta a ɛbɛn Ofoase no. ɔde ahyɛ sɛ saa amena no yɛ yɛn mansin soafoɔ, Hon. Alexander Frimpong ne yɛn abatoa mpɛsoaso mmabunu dɔmfrɛfoɔ
Yɛpɛ sɛ yɛka ma obiara te sɛ, saa nsɛnkae no nyɛ nokware sɛ saa amena no yɛ yɛn soafoɔ no ne mmabunu dɔmfrɛfoɔ no deɛ
ɛyɛ ɔkwan baako a nnipa binom pɛ sɛ wɔfa sɛ animuonyam a yɛ mansin soafoɔ yi ɔwɔ na ɔmma ɔmanpanin pam no
Yɛpɛ sɛ yɛsi soɔ bio sɛ, yɛn mansin soafoɔ no nyɛ galamsey, na ɔnyɛɛ galamsey adwuma no bi da na ɔnyɛ bi nso da berɛ a ɔreboa ɔmanpanin ama no ako atia saa adwuma yi. Sɛdeɛ adi kan adan adi wɔ kaseɛ a ɛdii kan bae no mu no. Hon. Alexander Frimpong reko galamsey a ɛwɔ ne mansin no mu pa ara. N’adwuma den ne n’akwankyerɛ aboa ama yɛakyerɛ galamseyfoɔ mmiɛnsa a wɔredi wɔn asɛm wɔ Juaso Circuit Court.
Yɛn nhwehwɛmu kyerɛ yɛn sɛ, onipa a ɔhyɛ saa nsɛm yi ase ne obi a ɔkɔgyinaa wɔ NPP mmarahyɛbedwa akonnwa no bi a wantumi annya no, na anka ɔrehwɛ anim sɛ ɔmanpanin bɛbɔ ne nnipa din ama no abɛyɛ mansin soafoɔ a wantumi annya na ɔreyɛ saa nneɛma yi
Deɛ mansin no apolisifoɔ kaa ne sɛ, saa amena no yɛ amena dada a adi boro mfeɛ aduanu
Mmofra no kɔ hɔ kɔhwehwɛ sikakɔkɔɔ sɛdeɛ daa ɔyɛ no no nanso saa da no nko ara deɛ amena no bu guu wɔn so na baako faa mu wui
Nnipa a ɔdi mu wɔ National Democratic Congress (NDCɔ, Sylvester Mensah kyerɛ sɛ mfidie a wɔde tutu fam no a wɔde yɛ amenamudwuma a wɔrehye no wɔ ɔman no mu mmeaɛ binom no yɛ akwadwo dwuma a aban no reyɛ
ɔkyeɛrɛ sɛ, wɔbɛtumi de mfidie a wɔde tutu fam no ayɛ nnwuma pa, a ɛbɛtumi aboa nkurow binom mpontuo
Adeɛ bi a ɛda Facebook a onipa kan no na ɔda NHIS ano twerɛe ne sɛ, saa adwuma yi kyerɛ sɛ yɛnnwene
Aban no asan ahyɛ galamsey ɔko no ase wɔ ɔman no afaanan nyinaa ne titiriw ne kwae mu ne nsuo ho, ɛnam saa nti wɔato asraafoɔ agu mu sɛ ɔnkɔ na ɔma saafoɔ yi nyinaa nnyae
Nsɛm bi a abɛtodwa no kyerɛ sɛ, asraafoɔ yi hye mfidie a wɔde tutu fam no ne nneɛma binom a wɔde yɛ amenamudwuma no
Nanso deɛ Sylvester Mensah reka ne sɛ, aban no nnwene ɔkwan foforo a ɔbɛtumi de mfidie a wɔde tutu fam no a ɔrehye no no ayɛ
Ɔ se daakye aban nhye, mfidie a wɔde tutu fam a wɔgye.
NDC aban a ɔdwene daakye nhye mfidie a wɔde tutu fam, wei yɛ akwadwo dwuma ne adwene a aban no nnwene.
ɔtoaa so sɛ, saa mfidie yi, wɔbɛtumi de ayɛ nnwuma foforo binom
Nsɛn ahorow a Bawumia keka faa ɔman yi ɛkɔnomi ho yi, na yɛdwene sɛ, anka aban yi bɛtumi de saa mfidie yi ayɛ nneɛma binom wɔ ɔman yi mu na atumi apagya ɛkɔnomi no mu na aboa ɔman yi mpontuo
Yɛrehu adwene a yɛannwene yie ho nsunsuansoɔ
ɔsoafoɔ a ɔhwɛ banbɔ so, Dominic Nitiwui de too dwa nansa yi ara sɛ asraafoɔ adwuma a wɔahye ase no wɔsɛe nnuadan baako, plastike nkonnwa 10, mfidie a wɔde tutu fam 28, afidie a ɔde twe nsuo 18, baterise 8, korɔ num ɛnna kyamfanfoɔ mfidie no nso 267
Mfidie a ɔde twe nsuo 21, baterise 2, kia kaa, ne tuo mmienu na wɔgyeɛ.
ɔman no banbɔ dwumakuofoɔ 33 a wɔkyee wɔn wɔ Apue mantam no, wɔredi wɔn asɛm wɔ Kaneshie mansin asɛnibea hɔ nanso kɔɔto antie asɛm no nti wɔama wɔn baili
Nsusui antumi amma mu sɛ deɛ ɛteɛ nti no asɛnnibea no amma nnipa du-baako a wɔsusu sɛ ɔka ho no baili
Deɛ ɔrebɔ kwaadu no, ASP Syvester Asare, kɔɔ kɔrto nnɛ kɔgyee tumi krataa a ɛbɛboa ama wɔapɛ adanseɛ de atia akyefoɔ no
Kwaadu a ɔde rebɔ no ne sɛ, ɔkura tuo a mmara mma ne ho kwan sɛ ɔnkura
Nanso mmaranimfoɔ a ɔrebɔ n’akyidɔm no twee ɔtemuafoɔ, Ama Adomako Kwakye adwene kɔɔ so sɛ section 192 (2ɔ of the ɔriminal and Offenɔes Act1960, Act29 kyerɛ sɛ ansa na wɔbɛtumi ayɛ biribi saa no gye sɛ ɔtwerɛ kɔma atonney general ansa na wɔatumi agyegye saa nsɛnkae no so
ɔtemmuafoɔ Adomako Kwakye, gyinaa deɛ ɔkaa no so, yɛɛ sɛ ɔntena asɛm no so
ɔkaa sɛ, nhyehyɛe a ɔyɛe no nkyerɛ sɛ ɔbaili no anaasɛ ɔmaa no remande sɛ ɔmmra kɔɔto na ɔmmɛdi n’asɛm ɛno nti ɔgyinaa so gyae no
Nanso ɛnam sɛ saa nsɛnkae bi saa no wɔhia wɔn no nti no, wɔsan maa wɔkyee nnipa du-baako no ntem pa ara bio.
Sɛ yɛhwɛ kwaadu no a, saa nnipa aduasa-mmiɛnsa no yɛɛ wɔn ho sɛ, ɔman no banbɔkuofoɔ nanso na wɔnyɛ
Saa nkurɔfoɔ yi a wɔkyee wɔn yi akɔ nkurow pii so wɔ Apue mantam ne Asante mantam no mu a ɔreyɛ galmasey
Wɔabɔ nkurommafoɔ bi hu, na wɔasan agye sikakɔkɔɔ ahodoɔ binom afiri wɔn hɔ ɛnam sɛ wɔayɛ wɔn ho sɛ ɔman no banbɔkuofoɔ nti
ɔman no banbɔkuo no nyaa nteɛ sɛ wɔ ɔpɛpɔn bosome no mu sɛ, nnipabinom a wɔkura wɔkura atuo a wɔayɛ wɔn ho sɛ abanbɔfoɔ bi reyɛ galamsey wɔ Apue mantam a ɔreteetee kurommafoɔ binom
ɛnna Kotonimaa 4, 2021, wɔgyae ɔman no banbɔkuofoɔ no bi firii wɔn atenae kɛseɛ no mu sɛ wɔnkɔ Akenteng kwae a ɛbɛn Osinease a ɛwɔ Apue mantam no mu no, ɛhɔ na ɔkɔgyee saa nkurɔfoɔ yi firii mmabunu a ɔwɔ kuro yi mu nsam
Kwaadubɔfoɔ no kyerɛɛ sɛ, saa kwaadu yi Apue mantam polisi no taa akyire
Saa nnipa yi a, yɛabɔ wɔn kwaadu yi, yɛde wɔn kɔɔ Nkran a yɛkɔtotoo wɔn ano a ɔgye too mu sɛ, ampa wɔnnyɛ ɔman no banbɔ adwumayɛfoɔ
Mmom no wɔgye too mu sɛ, atuo ahodoɔ no yɛ wɔn dea
Wɔsan kaa sɛ, na wɔwɔ kwae no mu rehwehwɛ sika
Nneɛma a kwaadu no dan no adi sɛ wɔkura no yɛ Tudor tuo ketewa, pump-Action, atuo nketewa mmienu, assault rifles ne rounds ammunition du ɛnna ɔougar pistol
Kwaadubɔfoɔ no kaa sɛ, wɔgyee Tudor tuo ketewa, pump-Action, atuo nketewa mmienu, assault rifles ne rounds ammunition du ɛnna ɔougar pistol
Kuo no kaa sɛ, wɔsan nso gyee gotta kasanoma 12, hankɔfo mmiɛnsa, sofi nan ɛnna ɛleturɔneke shɔka
Ghana asraa adwuma no asan ahyɛ wɔn dwumadie a ɛtɔ so mmienu a ɔde reko galamsey no ase
Nsɛnkae a afiri amaneɛ asoeɛ aba ne sɛ, dwumadie a ɔfrɛ no Operation Halt II no yɛ deɛ wɔreyɛ de ayi nnipa ne nneɛma a wɔde yɛ amenamutuo adwuma no nyinaa afiri hɔ
Nsɛnkae no kyerɛ sɛ, saa dwumadie foforo yi bɛgyina Asuo Pra a amenamudwuma yi a ɛnnam mmara kwan so yi anya so nsunsuansoɔ yi
Ghana asraafoɔ nso ahyɛ akodeɛ nsrakɔ wɔ Asuo Pra no so
Saa dwumadie yi mmarima ahaanan a dibea biara bi wɔ mu
Wɔatu Ghanafoɔ fo sɛ wɔntwe wɔn ho mfiri amenamutu adwuma yi hɔ na asraafoɔ yi abofu hyɛ amma wɔn so
ɛnam nansa yi dwuma a wɔredi de ako galamsey no, wɔagyae asraafoɔ ahaanu sɛ wɔnkɔ na wɔnkɔpam galamseyfoɔ a wɔresɛe nsuo ani no nyinaa
Saa nsusui yi bae beɛ a aban no yɛɛ ɔmanfoɔ nhyimu gyee ɔmanfoɔ adwene wɔ ɔkwan a ɔbɛfa so asi amenamudwuma yi a ɛnam mmara kwan so yi ano wɔ Oforisuo 14 ne 15, 2021.
Asantehene, Otumfoɔ Osei Tutu II, ahyɛ ɔmanpanin ɔmmɔ mmɔden mfa ahemfo nwura galamsey ko no
ɔkyerɛ sɛ, ahemfo a wɔmfa wɔnwura galamsey ɔko no mu nti na mmerɛ a atwa mu no nyinaa agye agu
Berɛ a ɔrekasa wɔ Manhyia ahemfie berɛ a ngudeɛ asoeɛsfoɔ kɔsra no, Asantehene kaa sɛ ɛsɛ ahemfo nso nya kwan di dwuma wɔ galamsey ko no mu.
ɔkyerɛ sɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ ahemfo nso nya kwan na wɔtumi ka anammɔn a wɔafa ma obi krataa sɛ ɔnnyina so mfa ntu agudeɛ no. ɔkyerɛ sɛ, sɛ amma no saa a, ɛma ahemfo no nso de wɔn ho gye galamsey adwuma no mu bi.
Amammara no mpo ka sɛ, agudie no yɛ ɔmanpanin no dea, nanso yɛn nyinaa nim sɛ sikakɔkɔɔ no wɔ asaase no mu ɛnna asaase no nso yɛ ahemfo no dea
Yɛtumi ma ɔhɔhoɔ krataa a ɛma no kwan sɛ ɔmmɛtu agudie wɔ ɔhene bi asaase so nanso yɛde krataa no ma wɔ nkran
ɛnam sɛ yɛmfa ahemfo no nka ho no nti no, wɔn nso yɛ galamsey no bi
Sɛ wɔde ɔhene no ka saa dwumadie yi ho a, wɔmfa wɔn ho nnyɛ mu
Amenamutuo adwuma nketewa yi a ɔmanfoɔ frɛ no galamsey no adi atenatwie wɔ ɔman no nkɔmmɔdie nyinaa mu wɔ mfeɛ kakra a atwam yi mu ɛfiri berɛ a Citi News hyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ ɔreka ɛso nsunsuanso ho asɛm no
Afe 2017 no mu no, ɔmanpanin Akufo Addo hyɛɛ sɛ ɔde ne manpaninno bɛsi hɔ ako atia galamsey
Nneɛma ahodoɔ a na edi ne hyɛ yi akyi ne sɛ ogyae apolisifoɔ ne asraafoɔ ma wɔkɔɔ ɔman no afaanan nyinaa sɛ ɔnhwɛ na ɔnsi amenamutuo a ɛnnam mmara kwan so no nyinaa ano
Nansa yi ara, yɛanya nkasaho pii a ɛkyerɛ sɛ yɛn nsuo ahodoɔ a na ani rete no asan resɛe bio ɛnam sɛ galamsey no asan aka ne ho wɔ mmeae ahodoɔ wɔ ɔman no mu nti no
ɔmanpanin Akufo Addo kasa faa ɔkwan a ɔbɛfa ama saa adwuma yi atu mpon na deɛ ɔkaa ne sɛ, ɔhia ɔmanfoɔ adwenekyerɛ wɔ ɔkwan a ɔbɛtumi afa so
Aban no nam nsaase ne abɔdeɛ mu nneɛma asoeɛ no so yɛɛ nnaanu nhyimu faa ɔman mu no nyinaa adwene a wɔwɔ fa amenamutu nketewa adwuma no ho, deɛ ɛfiri mu bae no ne sɛ, aban no mfa agudietuo mmara no nyɛ adwuma
ɛnam saa nkɔmmɔtwetwe no nti no, nsaase soafoɔ no hyɛɛ wɔn a wɔreyɛ nsaase nhwehwɛmu wɔ nnyae kwae no mu no nyinaa sɛ wɔnnyae a wɔhyɛɛ wɔn nna nson pɛ
Saa ɔkwan yi ne ahodoɔ binom na wɔbɛfa so de asi amenamutu adwuma nketewa a ɛnnam mmara kwan so no afiri hɔ.
ɔko a yɛreko atia galamsey no reyɛ adan ɛnam aban no nkoguo ahodoɔ a wadi wɔ ɔko no mu. Yɛayɛ temanmufoɔ yi, ɛsɛ sɛ ɛha yɛn ɛnam sɛ, ɛso nsunsuansoɔ a saa galamsey adwuma yi de bɛba no, ɛbɛha yɛn nyinaa yɛ daakye
Saa galamseyfoɔ adwuma yi a wɔreyɛ yi ni, nkakrankakra ɛrenya yɛn so nsunsuansoɔ bɔne wɔ yɛn nsaase so, yɛn suo so ɛnna ɛresɛe yɛn nsaase a yɛtumi de dua nneɛma nso
Adan adi pefee sɛ nnwumakuo a anka wɔboa ma yɛhyɛ yɛn agudietuo mmara mu kena no wɔde kataasehyɛ asɛe ne nyinaa
Akufo Addo nkoguo a wadi wɔ galamsey ko wɔ mfeɛ nan yi a atwam no kyerɛ ne mmerɛyɛ a ɔyɛ na bio nso no wɔnyɛ ɔkannifoɔ pa a ɔbɛtumi aboa ama yɛako atia galamsey no
Saa ɔmanfoɔ adwenekyerɛ yi yɛ adeɛ aban yi yɛɛ no mfeɛ nan a atwan no a ɛmaa no dii nkoguo no
Yɛrehwɛ anim sɛ saa nhyimu no ɔkwan mapa bi bɛfiri mu aba afa sɛdeɛ yɛbɛtumi asi saa ɔhaw yi ano
ɛyɛ mmɔbɔ sɛ, nsɛnkae a ɛfiri ɔsoafoɔ a ɔhwɛ amanneɛ de bae fa ɔmanfoɔ adwenekyerɛ fa ɔkwan a ɔbɛfa asi ɔhaw yi ano kwan yi mmoa wɔ ɔkwan biara so
Saa nsɛnkae yi yɛ deɛ ɛmu yɛ hare na enni nnyinasoɔ biara fa ɔkwan a saa adeɛ yi bɛtumi ayɛ adwuma
Nsɛnkae no kyerɛ sɛ aban no hyɛ adwuma no mu nanso ɔntumi mfa nhyehyɛe papa biara mma a ɛbɛboa asi ɔhaw no ano kwan
ɔmanpanin Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo ka no mpɛn pii wɔ ne ho a ɔde ato hɔ amenamutu adwuma nketewa no a wɔsan frɛ no galamsey
ɔmanpanin san kaa sɛ, ɔbɛyɛ deɛ ɔbɛtumi biara wɔ ne tumi mu wɔ ne berɛ a ɛtɔ so mmienu yi de asi galamsey no kwan berɛ a Okyehene Osagyefo Amoatia Ofori Panin ne Akyem Abuakwa Traditional Council no too wɔn nsa frɛɛ no no
Ansa na saa nhyimu no rekɔbɛkɔ so no, aban no nam nsaase ne abɔdeɛ mu nneɛma asoeɛ no so yɛɛ nnaanu nhyimu faa ɔman mu no nyinaa adwene a wɔwɔ fa amenamutu nketewa adwuma no ho, deɛ ɛfiri mu bae no ne sɛ, aban no mfa agudietuo mmara no nyɛ adwuma
“ɛnam adwenefa a ɛkɔɔ so faa amenamutu adwuma nketewa no ho a ɛrekyerɛ sɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ galmasey adwuma no wɔgyae no, Ghana manpanin Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo ahyɛ Ghana asraafoɔ sɛ wɔnhyɛ wɔn dwumadie no ase na wɔnyi obibiara ne nneɛma biara a ɔde reyɛ galamsey no mfiri nsuo no ani
Anyɛ sɛdeɛ aban no de nhyehyɛe dada no ara na ɛreko galamsey no nti yɛnhu mpontuo biara wɔ mu. Yɛntumi ntoa so nyɛ ade dada no ara
Nsuo ahodoɔ a na ani rete no nyinaa ani resan asɛe ɛnam sɛ nnipa binom gu so reyɛ galamsey no wɔ ɔman no afaanan binom
Ayɛhummɔmɔ 2017 mu na ɔmanpanin Akufo Adoo de too dwa sɛ ɔde ne manpanyindie no bɛsi hɔ de ako atia galamsey
Nanso no yɛhwɛ deɛ galamsey akɔdu nnɛ yi ne ɛso nsunsuansoɔ a anya wɔ nsaase, asubonten ne nsuo so a, biribiara kyerɛ sɛ ɔmanpanin ko a ɔreko atia galamsey no atɔ nsuo mu
Sɛ ɔmanpanin antumi anko ɔko yi dea, ɛneɛ ɔmfa n’akongua no nto hɔ, na yɛnhu sɛ ampa ɔdi ne nsɛm so
Seesei deɛ bɔhyɛ hunu ne nnaadaa na wɔde daadaa yɛn
Nsɛmka deɛ ɛyɛ fo
ɛsɛ sɛ ɔmanpanin de ne nsɛm yɛ adwuma
Galamsey nsɛm yi yɛ asɛnhia nti ɛsɛ sɛ yɛn adwene kɔ so pa ara
Nsuo yɛ nkwa
Berɛ a ɔmanpanin de n’anodisɛm reto dwa wɔ ɔman no nyinaa nkɔmmɔ a ɛfa amenamutuo adwuma nketewa no ho no Wukuada, Oforisuo 14, 2021 no, ɔkaa sɛ wayɛ n’adwene sɛ ɔbɛma mmara ne obibiara a wɔbɛkye no sɛ ɔreyɛ galamsey no adi nanso no ɔntumi mma yɛnkye obi a onni adanseɛ
Ghanani biara nni hɔ a wɔaka sɛ ɔmanpanin ntwe obi aso ɛnam deɛ wɔte anaa adanseɛ bi a enni hɔ so
Deɛ ɛteɛ ne sɛ ɔmanpanin no nni tumi sɛ, ɔbɛtwe obi aso wɔ Ghana ha, asɛnnibea nko ara na wɔbɛtumi asaa
ɔmanpanin no agyinatuo no ɔmma yɛnya gyidie wɔ ɔmanpanin Akufo Addo mu sɛ ɔpɛ sɛ ɔboa ma yɛko galamsey yi a kataasehyɛ ahyɛ no ma yi.
Wei ma ɛne bɔhyɛ ahodoɔ a saa berɛ no a ɔgyina New PatrioticParty no anan mu apre manpaninadwa no ɔhyɛɛ no. Nana Akufo Addo ma yɛtee aseɛ sɛ, ɔba a ɔbɛtu kataasehyɛ ne porɔeɛɛ ase aberɛ a ɔde Anas kwan no bi bɛdi dwuma. Anas yi yɛ Abibiman nhwehwɛmu sɛntwerɛfoɔ no mi baako a, a deɛ ɔyɛ ne sɛ, ɔyɛ nhwehwɛmu fa kataasehye ho.
Wei mma no nyɛ nwanwa sɛ ɛbɛsi saa berɛ yi, yɛmfaa asotwe biara mmaa Atɔe mantam no NPP twerɛtwerɛfoɔ no ne asoeɛasoeɛ agyinatukuo dada no paninCharles Bissue wɔ kwaadu ahodoɔ a wɔabɔ no wɔ galamsey nsɛnsɛm ho yi nyinaa wɔ deɛ Anas Aremeyaw de bɛtoo dwa faa ne ho no
ɛnsan nyɛ nwanwa sɛ, wɔntuu anammɔn biara mfaa mfidie a wɔde tutu fam a ayera no ho no
ɛbɛsi nnɛ yɛntee hwee mfaa Operation Vanguardfoɔ no hɔ, ɔhaw ahodoɔ a wɔrekɔ mu, ne ɔko a ɔreko atia galamsey no deɛ akɔduru
Mmom deɛ, yɛhuu asraafoɔ binom wɔ ɛoy News kaseɛ mu sɛ wɔde wɔn ho agye adwuma yi mu
ɛneɛ na ɛkyerɛ sɛ, aban no de asraafoɔ reko tia adeɛ a yɛahu sɛ wɔreyɛ bi deɛ na kyerɛ sɛ yɛbɛka nokware dea, na sɛbɛ sɛbɛ aban no ankasa ɔnnim deɛ ɔreyɛ
Sɛ temanmufoɔ bɛnya aban no mu awerɛhyɛ mu dea, na agye sɛ adwuma biara a Operation Vanguardfoɔ no reyɛ no aban no ma yɛhu mu bi na bio nso no ɔkyerɛ yɛn baabi a mfidie a wɔde tutu fam no ara ayera no nyinaa afa
Sɛ Akufo Addo aban pɛ sɛ Ghanafoɔ nyinaa taa n’akyi wɔ galamsey ko no mu a, ɛsɛ sɛ ɔma ɔmanfoɔ hu biribiara a ɔreyɛ fa galmasey ko no ho na ɔsan ma ɔmanfoɔ te nneɛma ahodoɔ a ɔreyɛ no ase
ɛsɛ sɛ aban hu asotwe pɔtee a ɔde rema wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho ahyɛ galamsey adwuma no mu no ɛnam sɛ, saa galamsey yi ko tia nnipa fahodie, apɔmuden, nsaase ɛnna Iner-generational equity nhyehyɛe no. Bio nso no galamsey adwuma no kasa tia Sustainable Development Goals(SDGsɔ nhyehyɛe a ɛyɛ  1, 2, 3, 6, 8, 11, 12, 13, 14 ne 15
ɔhyɛ kɛkɛ a yɛhyɛ asraafoɔ yi sɛ ɔnko ntia galamsey adwuma yi ntumi mmoa mma yɛnni wɔn so nkonim ɛnam sɛ, asraafoɔ yi ankasa binom ka ho. ɛno nti no ɛsɛ sɛ yɛnya asotwe bi nso ma wɔn
mmarahyɛbɛdwani a ɔwɔ Tamale North a ɛwɔ Atifi mantam mu no, Alhassan Suhuyini, sɛ ɔno deɛ ɔnte aban nhyehyɛe no a ɔde reko galamsey no ase
ɔdeɛ ɔreka ne sɛ, aban no nhyehyɛe a ɔde baa sɛ ɔde resi galamsey ano no atɔ nsuo mu
ɔde saa asɛm yi too dwa ɛnam nansa yi asraafoɔ 200 a wɔgyae wɔn sɛ wɔnkɔ na wɔnkɔkyekye galamseyfoɔ a ɔresɛe nsuo ani no
Nsɛmkae a efiri asoeɛ a ɛbɔ amanneɛ no kyerɛ sɛ, “ɛnam adwenefa a ɛkɔɔ so faa amenamutu adwuma nketewa no ho no wɔ Oforisuo 14 ne 15 no a ɛrekyerɛ sɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ galmasey adwuma no wɔgyae no, Ghana manpaninNana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo ahyɛ Ghana asraafoɔ sɛ wɔnhyɛ wɔn dwumadie no ase na wɔnyi obibiara ne nneɛma biara a ɔde reyɛ galamsey no mfiri nsuo no ani
Saa dwumadie yi hyɛɛ aseɛ, dunhwere nsia Wukuada no Oforisuo 28, 2021 wɔ Asuo Pra a ɛwɔ mfinimfini mantan ne atɔe mantam no
Asraafoɔ ɔhammienu na wɔde wɔn redi saa dwuma yi
Berɛ a ɔrekasa wɔ Citi TV Breakfast Daily show so Benada, Oforisuo 29, 2021 no ɔkaa sɛ anka ɛsɛ sɛ aban no de mansin abanbɔfoɔ mmom na wɔde wɔn ko tia galamsey adwuma no na ɛnyɛ asraafoɔ mmom
Medwene sɛ, saa ɔkwan yi a yɛrefa so de asraafoɔ ako Galamsey no nyinaa no ɛnyɛ adwuma
Megye di sɛ ɔkwan a yɛbɛtumi afa so ne sɛ, yɛde mansin no banbɔkuo no mmom bɛko atia galamsey no na sɛ wɔpɛ mmoa dea
Ma wɔn ntumi nko wɔn haw, na aban no mmom mmoa wɔn wɔ saa adwuma yi ho
Saa kwan yi bɛtumi aboa asɛne deɛ yɛgu so reyɛ no a yɛnhu biribiara mfi ho no
Megye di sɛ ɔmanpanin bɛsua nyansa bi afiri ɔko a edii kan no, a ɔno ara kaa sɛ, yɛasɛe sika pii wɔ ho wɔ mfeɛ nan a edii kan twaa mu no
Nsaase ne abɔdeɛ mu nneɛma soafoɔ, Samuel Jinapor, aka sɛ galamsey ko yi wɔ nwiano.
ɔgyedi sɛ, ɔko yi aban no bɛdi nkonim
Deɛ ɔrekyerɛ ne sɛ, wɔde nhyehyɛe pii no ara na agugu apono so de reko atia saa galamsey yi
Berɛ a na ɔne mantam mu asoafoɔ rekasa wɔ ɛubileeHouse no, Mr Jinapor kaa sɛ, aban no ntoto ne bɔhyɛ a wɔahyɛ afa galamsey ko no ho ase koraa
Deɛ asi afa amenamutu adwuma nketewa no ho nyinaa no, yɛadu nkowie. Yɛadi ɔman mu no nyinaa nkɔmmɔ na seesei no yɛde nhyehyɛe bi agu akwan mu a ɛbɛhwɛ amenamutu adwuma nketewa no na aboa asi galamsey ano koraa ama ɔman no nyinaa
Nansa yi ara, aban no asan ahyɛ n’anammɔn a ɔretu de ako atia galamsey no mu kena bio ɛnam temanmufoɔ hyɛ a wɔahyɛ aban no sɛ ɔmfa amenamutuo mmara no nyɛ adwuma
Eyi ama aban no retu anammɔn pii
Aban no ahyɛ nnipa a na wɔwɔ kwae ahodoɔ no mu rehwɛ mmeaɛ a sika wɔ no sɛ wɔnnyae nkɔsi sɛ wɔbɛka sɛ wɔnkɔ bio
Wɔasan ahyɛ Ngudeɛ Asoeɛ sɛ ɔnnyae krataa a wɔde ma nkurɔfoɔ sɛ wɔmfa nkɔhwehwɛ nsaase so no
ɔsoafo a ɔhwɛ nsaase ne abɔdeɛmu nneɛma so no ahyɛ nnipa a wɔkura tumi krataa ne nnwumakuo a wɔkura tumi krataa nyinaa sɛ wɔnnyae kwae nsaase nhwehwɛmu no ɛnkɔsi sɛ, wɔbɛte biribi afiri aban no hɔ
ɔsoafoɔ no san kaa sɛ, ɔsoafo a ɔhwɛ nsaase ne abɔdeɛmu nneɛma so no asan aka akyerɛ ngudeɛ asoeɛ sɛ enni kwan sɛ wɔgye, anaa ɔyɛ obiara krataa a ɛma no ho kwan ma no kɔyɛ asaase so nhwehwɛmu hwɛ sɛ anyɛ biara sika wɔ mu anaa.
ɔsoafoɔ a ɔhwɛ amanneɛ soɔ no, Kojo Oppong Nkrumah se ɛnkyɛ koraa aban no abɛsan de nhyehyɛe foforo bɛba a ɔbɛma asraafoɔ akɔpam amenamutufoɔ afiri nsuo ahodoɔ no so
Deɛ ɔrepɛ akyerɛ ne sɛ, saa nhyehyɛe yi yɛ deɛ ɛreba abɛboa ama aban no atumi asi amenamutu adwuma a ɛnnam mmara kwan so no ano
Wɔgyae asraafoɔ ahaanu Wukuada, Oforisuo 28, 2021 sɛ wɔn sɛ wɔnkɔ na wɔnkɔkyekye galamseyfoɔ a ɔresɛe nsuo ani wɔ ɔman no mu no
Ghana asraa adwuma no dii saa dwuma yi ɛnam nsɛnkae a ɔmanpanin Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo de maa wɔn
Nsɛnkae a ɛfiri amanneɛ soɔfoɔ hɔ bae ne sɛ, dwumadie no hyɛɛ aseɛ wɔ Asuo Pra a ɛwɔ Mfinimfini ne Atɔe mantam mu
Nsɛmkae a efiri asoeɛ a ɛbɔ amanneɛ no kyerɛ sɛ, “ɛnam adwenefa a ɛkɔɔ so faa amenamutu adwuma nketewa no ho no wɔ Oforisuo 14 ne 15 no a ɛrekyerɛ sɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ galmasey adwuma no wɔgyae no, Ghana manpaninNana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo ahyɛ Ghana asraafoɔ sɛ wɔnhyɛ wɔn dwumadie no ase na wɔnyi obibiara ne nneɛma biara a ɔde reyɛ galamsey no mfiri nsuo no ani
Saa dwumadie yi hyɛɛ aseɛ, dunhwere nsia Wukuada no Oforisuo 28, 2021 wɔ Asuo Pra a ɛwɔ mfinimfini mantan ne atɔe mantam no
Ghana asraafoɔ ahaanu na wɔde wɔn redi saa dwuma yi
Mr. Oppong Nkrumah nkɔmmɔ a ɔne Citi News dii ne sɛ nnipa a wɔwɔ Kwae ahodoɔ mu a wɔretu sika no wɔde pam wɔn nyinaa
Banbɔ asoeɛ no ne Ghana asraafoɔ adwuma no bɛkyerɛ ɔkwan ne nhyehyɛe a ɛbɛboa ama wɔatumi di saa ɔko yi so nkonim asene deɛ wɔdii kan yɛe no
Nnya kwae no yɛ bɛeaɛ a yɛnkɔ hɔ nkɔyɛ amenamudwuma
Eyi mfa ho sɛ, mmara ma wo kwan anaa mmara mma wo kwan
ɛno nti na Ghana manpaninahyɛ asraafoɔ sɛ ɔnyi obibiara ne nneɛma biara a wɔde reyɛ amenamutu adwuma no mfiri hɔ no. Na wɔrehyɛ aseɛ afiri Asuo Pra so
ɔsoafoɔ dada a na ɔhwɛ nsaase ne abɔdeɛ mu nneɛma soɔ no, Inusah Fuseini, se ɔmanpanin Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo bɛtumi agya din papa ato hɔ sɛ ɔtumi si galamsey ano a.
Deɛ ɔreka ne sɛ, ɛnnɛ mma ne daaky mma bɛbɔ agye ne so, sɛ ɔtumi si saa ɔhaw yi ano a
Tamale Central mmarahyɛbɛdwani dada ka biribi nansa yi ara deɛ ɔmanpanin Akufo Addo kae wɔ ne ho a ɔde resi hɔ ako galamsey no
ɔmanpanin Akufo-Addo se, ɔbɛyɛ deɛ ɔbɛtumi biara de asi galamsey ano ansa na ne berɛ a ɛtɔ so mmienu no atwam ɔpɛpɔn, 2015
Ɛnam sikakɔkɔɔ tuo no nti no, ɔhuu sɛ nsuo a ɛdi mu bi te sɛ Birim ne Ankɔbra asɛe, ne saa nti no ɔde nneɛma guu akwan mu de see ɛbɛyɛ na fagudeɛ a aka no nhwere nkyirimma
Yɛahu deɛ ato asuo Birim, Ankɔbra ne nsuwansuwa nkaeɛ
Sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ na Ghanafoɔ bɛhunu sɛ m'ani abre nti no, mede nneɛma bɛgu akwan mu de ko tia sika kɔkɔɔ tuo sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ na sika kɔkɔɔ, nsuo ne fagudeɛ a yɛn nananom de gyaa yɛn no na yɛn nso de begya nkyirimma.
Ɔkaa sɛ, ɔbɛyɛ biribiara wɔ ne tumi mu de sikakɔkɔɔ tuo no dwumadie no aba awieɛ
Owura Fuseni kyerɛ sɛ ɔmanpanin mfa ne nan nsi fam na ɔnhwɛ ensi saa ɔhaw yi ano na ɛmmoa ammɔ ɔman no daakye ho ban
Kasa no reyɛ adɔɔso dodo
Anamɔntuo no na ehia, nanso me ne ɔmanpanin yɛ adwene na me sane nso hyɛ no sɛ ɔmmɔ ne ho mmɔden ɛfiri sɛ, deɛ ɛyɛ nyinaa na waka no.
Yɛntumi nhwɛ mma nnipa bi nsɛe ɔman no mfudeɛ ɛnam deɛ wɔbɛnya nti ɛfiri sɛ yɛabrɛ ansaana ɛreduru deɛ aduru yi.
Yɛn nananom nim sika kɔkɔɔ no nanso Wɔantu no wɔ nsuo mu . Bio, wɔn ansɛe yɛn kwaeɛ ɛnam sikakɔkɔɔ nti .
Na mmom no wɔde gyaa yɛn kwaeɛ ne fagudeɛ a yɛn ani gye ho, na yɛbɛtumi de yɛn nsa si yɛn bo sɛ yɛn na yɛma kokoo fa kɛseɛ no ara
Wei na wɔde gyaa yɛn na ɛdeɛn na yɛn nso de regya nkyirimma
Yɛntumi mma pɛsɛmenkomenyafoɔ yi nsɛe no mma yɛn
Yɛntumi na nsɛ sɛ yɛtumi nso. ɔmanpanin no ntu anammɔn mprempren yi ara.
Na sɛ ɔmanpanin antumi annya dinpa biara mpo a, ɔkwan a wobɛfa so ama nwumakuo nketewa a wɔtu sika kɔkɔɔ no so ate ne sɛ wo mpene mma wɔn nni wɔn dwuma
Sɛ woyɛ saa a, nyɛ nnɛ mma nko ara na ɛbɛyi wo ayɛ na mmom nkyirimma a wɔnnya nwoo nyinaa.
Berɛ a Owura Inusah Feseini ɔreka wɔ Citi FM/TV so wɔ wɔn nnawɔtwe awie dwumadie a wɔato ne din sɛ The Big Issue no memeneda, Oforisuo 24, 2021.
ɔmanpanin Nana Addo Dankwa Akuff-Addo ka no mpɛn pii wɔ ne ho a ɔde ato hɔ amenamutu adwuma nketewa no a wɔsan frɛ no galamsey
ɔmanpanin Akufo-Addo se, ɔbɛyɛ deɛ ɔbɛtumi biara de asi galamsey ano ansa na ne berɛ a ɛtɔ so mmienu no atwam ɔpɛpɔn, 2015
Nana Akufo-Addo kaa yei berɛ Ɔ kyehene, Ɔ saagyefo Amoatia Ofori Panin ne Akyem Abuakwa mpaninfoɔ kɔɔ nsrahwɛ wɔ Jubilee House Fiada, Oforisua da a ɛtɔ so aduonu mmiɛnsa wɔ afe 2021 mu.
Ɛnam sikakɔkɔɔ tuo no nti no, ɔhuu sɛ nsuo a ɛdi mu bi te sɛ Birim ne Ankɔbra asɛe , ne saa nti no ɔde nneɛma bɛguu akwan mu de sedeɛ ɛbɛyɛ na fagudeɛ a aka no nhwere nkyirimma
Yɛahu deɛ ato asuo Birim, Ankɔbra ne nsuwansuwa nkaeɛ
Sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ na Ghanafoɔ bɛhunu sɛ m'ani abre nti no, mede nneɛma bɛgu akwan mu de ko tia sika kɔkɔɔ tuo sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ na sika kɔkɔɔ, nsuo ne fagudeɛ a yɛn nananom de gyaa yɛn no na yɛn nso de begya nkyirimma.
Ɔkaa sɛ, ɔbɛyɛ biribiara wɔ ne tumi mu de sikakɔkɔɔ tuo no dwumadie no aba awieɛ
Amenamutuo adwuma nketewa yi a ɔmanfoɔ frɛ no galamsey no adi atenatwie wɔ ɔman no nkɔmmɔdie nyinaa mu wɔ mfeɛ kakra a atwam yi mu ɛfiri berɛ a Citi News hyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ ɔreka ɛso nsunsuanso ho asɛm no
Afe 2017 no mu no, ɔmanpanin Akufo Addo hyɛɛ sɛ ɔde ne manpaninno bɛsi hɔ ako atia galamsey
Nneɛma ahodoɔ a na edi ne hyɛ yi akyi ne sɛ ogyae apolisifoɔ ne asraafoɔ ma wɔkɔɔ ɔman no afaanan nyinaa sɛ ɔnhwɛ na ɔnsi amenamutuo a ɛnnam mmara kwan so no nyinaa ano
Nansa yi ara, yɛanya nkasaho pii a ɛkyerɛ sɛ yɛn nsuo ahodoɔ a na ani rete no asan resɛe bio ɛnam sɛ galamsey no asan aka ne ho wɔ mmeae ahodoɔ wɔ ɔman no mu nti no
ɔmanpanin Akufo Addo kasa faa ɔkwan a ɔbɛfa ama saa adwuma yi atu mpon na deɛ ɔkaa ne sɛ, ɔhia ɔmanfoɔ adwenekyerɛ wɔ ɔkwan a ɔbɛtumi afa so
Aban no nam nsaase ne abɔdeɛ mu nneɛma asoeɛ no so yɛɛ nnaanu nhyimu faa ɔman mu no nyinaa adwene a wɔwɔ fa amenamutu nketewa adwuma no ho, deɛ ɛfiri mu bae no ne sɛ, aban no mfa agudietuo mmara no nyɛ adwuma
ɛnam saa nkɔmmɔtwetwe no nti no, nsaase soafoɔ no hyɛɛ wɔn a wɔreyɛ nsaase nhwehwɛmu wɔ nnyae kwae no mu no nyinaa sɛ wɔnnyae a wɔhyɛɛ wɔn nna nson pɛ
Saa ɔkwan yi ne ahodoɔ binom na wɔbɛfa so de asi amenamutu adwuma nketewa a ɛnnam mmara kwan so no afiri hɔ.
Kookoo adwuma a ɛwɔ Ghana no rehinhim, sɛ Europefoɔ Nkabom kuo no yɛsɛ wɔnnye yɛn kookoo no bio a
Ghana kookoo adwumakuo no nnaanoni, Joseph Boahen Aidoo na ɔde saa asɛm yi too dwa
Eyi gyina kɔkɔbɔ a EU foɔ de bɔɔ yɛn faa ɔsom a sɛ Ghana anhwɛ yie a ɔde bɛto yɛn kookoo no so no ɛnam galamsey no ara ɛresɛe yɛn nsaase no.
MR. Boahen Aidoo ne Citi News retwetwe nkɔmmɔ no, ɔkaa sɛ ɔmanfoɔ nyinaa mmoa na yɛnko ntia galamsey ɛnam sɛ ɛresɛe yɛn kookoo no
Wei yɛ ɔhaw pa ara ɛnam sɛ, Europefoɔ gye yɛn kookoo no ɔha mu aduowɔtwe
Na sɛ wɔde ɔsom to yɛn so a, ɛbɛyɛ den pa ara sɛ yɛbɛtumi atɔn yɛn kookoo no
Yɛakɔyɛ ɔman yi, ɛsɛ sɛ yɛsi agyinae wɔ eyi ho na yɛko tia galamsey a yɛmfa amnyɔsɛm mmɛhyehyɛ mu
Sei no, Ghana de ne kookoo no mu ɔhamu nkyekyɛ mu aduɔwɔtwe na ɛkɔ Europe aman soɔ
EUfoɔ no retu anammɔn wei ɛnam sɛ mfoni a wɔhu wɔ wɔn sɛtelaite mu fa yɛn kwae no kyerɛ sɛ Ghana nsaase no resɛe
Nnipa a wɔwɔ kuayɛ adwuma no mu adan suro a wɔsuro nsunsuansoɔ a ɛbɛnya wɔ Ghana kookoo adwuma no so
Dr. Emmanuel Agyeman Dwomoh a ɔyɛ Chief Executive in-charge of Agronomy and Quality Control wɔ COCOBOD no abediakyire no adi kan ahyɛ sɛ, ɔman no ntu ntɛm pa ara anammɔn sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ na wɔbɛtumi asesa asotwe a ɔman no bɛnya no
Yɛrekasa yi a, EU rebɔ Ghana ne Côte d’Ivoire nterɛne sɛ ɔmma kwan ma yɛmfa mmra biara nto yɛn kookoo a yɛde ba wɔn hɔ no
Sɛ wohwɛ setelaite no mu a, mmeaeɛ no bi sɔ kɔkɔɔ nti no EU dwene sɛ ɛyɛ kookoo na ama no ayɛ saa mmom no ɛyɛ galamsey
ɔpɛpɔn 2021, Europefoɔ nkabom kuo de too dwa sɛ wɔde Euro sika ɔpepem aduanu num bɛba abɛhyɛ Côte d’Ivoire, Ghana ne Cameroon adwadie, mmɔnten ne nsaase yiedi a ɛboa ma yɛn kookoo no tumi so no mu. Wiase nyinaa wɔn a wɔtumi dua kookoo pa ara, deɛ ɔto so mmienu ne deɛ ɔto so num a wɔn kookoo no yɛ wiase kookoo no ɔhamu nkyekyemu aduɔson
Saa sika yi bɛboa ahyɛ nkitahodie ne ayɔnkofa a ɛda saa ɔman mmiɛnsa yi a wɔdua kookoo no ne Europrfoɔ ntam, na ama yɛasi asaase sɛe ne mmɔfra a yɛde wɔn yɛ adwuma no ano kwan
Europefoɔ Nkabom rebɔ kɔkɔ sɛ ɔbɛbane kookoo a ɛfiri Ghana ɛnam nsunsuansoɔ bɔne a galamsey renya wɔ nsaase no so nti
Berɛ a Dr. Emmanuel Agyeman Dwomoh a ɔyɛ Chief Executive in-ɔharge of Agronomy and Quality ɔontrol wɔ ɔOɔOBOD no abediakyire no rekasa wɔ ɔmanmu no nyinaa adwenekyerɛ dwumadie no a ɛfa galamsey ko no ho no, ɔkyerɛɛ suro a ɔsuro ɛnam nsunsuansoɔ bɔne a galamsey no de bɛbrɛ Ghana kookoo adwuma no
Sei no, Ghana de ne kookoo no mu ɔhamu nkyekyɛ mu aduɔwɔtwe na ɛkɔ Europe aman soɔ
Dr. Emmanuel Agyemang Dwomoh susu sɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ ɔman no tu anammɔn bi anim anim yi ara
Yɛrekasa yi a, EU rebɔ Ghana ne Côte d’Ivoire nterɛne sɛ ɔmma kwan ma yɛmfa mmra biara nto yɛn kookoo a yɛde ba wɔn hɔ no
EUfoɔ no retu anammɔn wei ɛnam sɛ mfoni a wɔhu wɔ wɔn sɛtelaite mu fa yɛn kwae no kyerɛ sɛ Ghana nsaase no resɛe
Sɛ wohwɛ setelaite no mu a, mmeaeɛ no bi sɔ kɔkɔɔ nti no EU dwene sɛ ɛyɛ kookoo na ama no ayɛ saa mmom no ɛyɛ galamsey
ɔsan nso kyerɛɛ n’adwene faa nsunsuansoɔ bɔne a ɛwɔ galamsey so no
Nsunsuansoɔ a saa nneyɛe yi de ba kookoo no so no so
Nwura ɛresa, nnuaba mmɔe ne sika a yɛnya so rete, yɛrehwere yɛn kwae, nnuane nnuro a ɛwɔ yɛn nsaase no mu no resɛe , kookoo aba no tete berɛ a ɛnyinii ɛnam nnuro a akɔ asaase no mu nti
ɔpɛpɔn 2021, Europefoɔ nkabom kuo de too dwa sɛ wɔde Euro sika ɔpepem aduanu num bɛba abɛhyɛ Côte d’Ivoire, Ghana ne Cameroon adwadie, mmɔnten ne nsaase yiedi a ɛboa ma yɛn kookoo no tumi so no mu. Wiase nyinaa wɔn a wɔtumi dua kookoo pa ara, deɛ ɔto so mmienu ne deɛ ɔto so num a wɔn kookoo no yɛ wiase kookoo no ɔhamu nkyekyemu aduɔson
Saa sika yi bɛboa ahyɛ nkitahodie ne ayɔnkofa a ɛda saa ɔman mmiɛnsa yi a wɔdua kookoo no ne Europefoɔ ntam, na ama yɛasi asaase sɛe ne mmɔfra a yɛde wɔn yɛ adwuma no ano kwan
mmarahyɛbɛdwani a ɔwɔ Ningo-Prampram, Mr. Sam Nartey George ahyɛ ɔman paninAkufo Addo sɛ ɔmfa ne nan nsi fam na ɔntumi nko ntia galamsey no
N’adwene kyerɛ mu no, ɔkyerɛ sɛ ɔmanpanin Akufo Addo de n’ano kɛkɛ na ɔde resi galamsey no
Deɛ ɔreka no ne sɛ, ɔmanpanin de n’ano na ɛrefa Ghanafoɔ ho, a anka ɔbetumi ayɛ adwuma no ankasa
Ningo-Prampram mmarahyɛbɛdwani yi ka sii so dua sɛ, wɔn a wɔreyɛ saa adeɛ yi yɛ wɔn a, aban no apaw wɔn a ebi nso yɛ New PatrioticParty amanyɔkuo no mufoɔ. ɛnam saa nti no aban no ntwe wɔn aso na ɛntumi mma afoforo ntwe wɔn ho mfiri nneyɛe no ho
ɔmanpanin, ɛyɛ wo ara w’amanyɔkuo mma, mantam mu mpaninfoɔ, wɔn a wɔne wo yɛ adwuma, wo soafoɔ adada nom na wɔhyɛ saa galamsey yi akyi
Wɔn ne nnipa a wɔreyɛ galamsey no, na wɔresɛe yɛn nsuo no. ɛno nti no, wopɛ sɛ woko galamsey no, fa wo sika to baabi a w’ano wɔ. Wo pɛ sɛ woko galamsey no a, wo ne wɔn a wɔapaw wɔn no nni na gyae nsɛmdɛ no a woreto yɛn no
Nokwasɛm no ne sɛ, ɔmanpanin, ɛyɛ wo ara amanyɔkuofoɔ na woreyɛ galamsey no.
NDCni biara nni hɔ a wɔreyɛ saa adwuma yi bi, ɛnam sɛ wɔn nni banbɔ adwumayɛfoɔ no so tumi a wɔbɛba abɛbɔ wɔn ho ban. Yɛnyɛ mfidie a wɔde tutu fam wɔ ɔman yi mu, ne nyinaa firi yɛn ne nyinaa firi pɔɔto na ɛba
Nti ɛhefo na ɛma kwan ma yɛde mfidie a wɔde tutu fam no ba ɔman yi mu
Nti sɛ, aban no ayɛ n’adwene sɛ ampa ara ɔbɛko galamsey no a, ɔntumi nsi mfidie a wɔde tutu fam a ɛba ɔman yi mu no ano kwan
Mr. Sam George kaa eyi berɛ a na ɔne Citi News Breakfast Daily dwumadie no retwetwe nkɔmmɔ Yawda, Oforisuo 15, 2021.
Ne nsɛnkae yi ba tia saa ɔmanmu adwenekyerɛ a ɔmanpanin sɛ nneɛma pa bi bɛfiri mo aba no ama wɔahunu sɛdeɛ wɔbɛko atia galamsey no
Megye di sɛ, saa dwumadie yi bɛkɔ awie no na nneɛma pa bi afiri mu aba na yɛate yɛn ho ase ahu akwanhodoɔ a yɛbɛtumi afa so asi galamsey no ano kwan, a ɛde nnuro ahodoɔ resɛe yɛn nsaase, mfidie a wɔde tutu fam ahodoɔ a wɔde retutu nsaase no mu sraadeɛ a ama ahɔhoɔ de wɔn ho abɛgye mu na wɔresɛe yɛn nsuo ani.
Nsaase ne abɔdeɛ mu nneɛma soafoɔ, Samuel Abu Jinapor se ɛsɛ sɛ yɛde asotwe a emu yɛ den ma amanyɔfoɔ, ahemfo ne nnipa binom a wɔtaa galamsey akyi no
Deɛ Mr. Jinapor reka ne sɛ, saa nnipa no wɔ hɔ a, ɛbɛyɛ den sɛ yɛbɛko atia galamsey no
Berɛ a ɔrekasa wɔ ɔman mu no nyinaa nkɔtwetwe a ɛfa galamsey ho no, Samuel Abu Jinapor kaa sɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ yɛtu anammɔn a ɛmu yɛhye na yɛtumi de ko tia saa ɔhaw yi
ɔkwan bɛn na yɛbɛfa so agu amanyɔfoɔ, ahemfo ne ɔsom mu mpaninfoɔ binom anim ase na yɛasan atwe wɔn aso, ɛnam wɔn sika a wɔwɔ a wɔde reboa saa adwuma yi no
Asɛmmisa baako a ɛho hia baako bio nso ne, nhyɛ bɛn na yɛbɛtumi de ahyɛ mmara no mu a ɛre nkɔ mma obibiara nso.
Saa ɔmanmu yi nyinaa nkɔmmɔtwetwe a ɛbɛwie nnɛ Oforisuo 15, 2021 yi yɛrehwɛ anim sɛ, yɛbɛnya akwan mapa afiri mu a ɛbɛboa ama yɛatumi ako galamsey yi
Saa dwumadie yi yɛ nnaanu dwumadie a ɛreboa ama yɛako atia galamsey no
Amenamutu adwuma nketewa kuo a wɔkasa tia galamsey no kyerɛ sɛ wɔn a wɔreyɛ galamsey no wɔ akyitaafoɔ binom a wɔbɔ wɔn ho ban.
Nnipabinom a wɔka saa ɔmanmu no nyinaa nkɔmmɔtwetwe a wɔretwetwe no kyerɛ sɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ aban no hyɛ amenamutuo adwuma no mmara no mu kena na ɛno ne ɔkwan baako a ɛbɛboa ama nnipa no agyae
Nsaase kuo A Roɔha Ghana abɔ kɔkɔ afa Ghana Integrated Aluminium Development Corporation (GIADEC) nhyehyɛe a wɔpɛ sɛ wɔyɛ de pagya bauxite mu no, ɔkyerɛ sɛ ɛbɛbue kwan ama galamsey.
ɛwom sɛ ekuo no ahyɛ sɛ ɔbɛhwɛ atoto amenamutu no yie, A Roɔha nso hu ne sɛ galamsey bɛba abɛdi afra mu
A Roɔha nsɛnkae mu no, ɔkyerɛɛ sɛ, ɔhaw a GIADEC bɛhu no yɛ deɛ ano yɛ den ɛnam bauxite tuo no nti. ɛfiri sɛ wɔbɛyiyi akwan ato kwae ahorow a akwan nna mu no na eyi bɛma galamseyfoɔ yi atumi akɔwura mu
Galamseyfoɔ yi bɛbɔ awura mmeaɛ a wɔntumi nkɔ hɔ sɛ GIADEC hyɛ aseɛ sɛ wɔreyɛ adwuma pɛ a
A Roɔha si so bio sɛ, sɛ wɔtu agudie wɔ Atewa kwae no mu a, ɛbɛyɛ ɔhaw kɛseɛ a ɛbɛsɛe kwae no mu die ne ne nneɛma a ɛwɔ mu no
ɔhyɛ GIADEC sɛ ɔnhwɛ anammɔn a aluminiɔm adwumakuo no bi adi kan atu no, wɔmfa abɔdeɛ mu nneɛma a ɛfiri Atewa kwae no mu.
Obubuo 4, 2020 no mu no nnipa a wɔka International Union for Conservation of Nature (IUCN) ho too aba de hyɛɛ ntɛm pa ara nhyehyɛe a ɛbɛbɔ Atewa kwae a ɛwɔ Ghana no ho ban
A Roɔha san de too dwa sɛ, sɛ mpo GIADEC sɛ ɔde nhyehyɛe mapa bɛgu akwan mu de ayɛ n’adwuma mpo a, Atewa kwae no deɛ, wɔnyi mfiri mu
Atewa kwae no yɛ kwae a ɛyɛ beaeɛ ma mmoadoma pii na ɛsan nso ma yɛn nsuo a ani te na Ghanafoɔ a ɔboro ɔpepemnum nya bi nom.
A Roɔha Ghana akan nsɛnkae a GIADEC de too nsɛnkyerɛfoɔ anim na ɛbaa mmɔtenso Dwoada, 5 Oforisuo a ɔreyi nsɛm binom ano no.
GIADEC sɛ nsɛnkae a ɛfa sɛ wɔbɛsɛe Atewa kwae no nyinaa ɛnam bauxitetuo no nti no ɔbɔ gu
ɔka sɛ, saa beaɛ no yɛ baabi a sɛ wode yɛ saa adwuma no a ɛbɛsɛe asetena mu nneɛma, nnua, mmoa tenabea ne nsu pa. Na eyi yɛ ɔha mu nkyekyɛmu du anaa ɛboro mfeɛ aduonum na bauxite a wɔbɛtu no yɛ tɔnso no ɔpepemnum
Sɛdeɛ yɛbɛte m’ase yie no, wɔn a wɔnka banbɔ kuo ho no haw yi nyinaa yɛ beaeɛ a wɔrekɔtu bauxite no. ɛhɔ yɛ bepɔ no soro. Na saa beaeɛ yi yɛ Atewa beaeɛ a mmara bɔ ho ban ketee na ɛyɛ baabi a abɔdeɛ mu nneɛma ne nsu a ani te wɔ. Sɛ yɛhwere nneɛma ahorow a ɛwɔ kwae no mu no a ɛbɛyɛ den sɛ yɛbɛtumi asan anya no bio
Nanso ɛrekame ayɛ sɛ GIADEC ɛnhu saa nneɛma yi nyinaa
Sɛ agudie a wɔretuo ne kɛseɛ te sɛn, ɛso anaasɛ ɛsoa wɔ Atewa kwae no mu a, ɛbɛyɛ ɔhaw kɛseɛ a ɛbɛsɛe kwae no mu die ne ne nneɛma a ɛwɔ mu no
Atewa kwae no ho hia yɛn pa ara nti yɛntumi mfa nni agorɔ
Nsɛnkae no kyerɛ sɛ, wɔn a wɔrekɔyɛ adwuma yi no, wɔkyerɛɛ wɔn ɛho nhyehyɛe bi a beaeɛ a wɔrekɔtu agudie no teɛ
Nanso no eyi ho nhia. ɛnam sɛ nkrataa bebree no ara na wɔatwerɛ afa Atewa kwae no ho ne nneɛma ahorow a ɛwɔ mu a baabi a wɔtu agudie yi mpo ka ho
Saa anodisɛm yi kyerɛ mmoa ne nneɛma binom a ɛwɔ atewa kwae no mu a sɛ agudie tuo no kɔ so a ɛbɛsɛe wɔn atenae na ɛbɛnya nsunsuansoɔ bɔne wɔ yɛn so. Sɛ yɛde anodisɛm bio bɛba no, yɛhia mmom sɛ anka yɛbɛyɛ abrabɔ ne atenae mu nhwehwɛmu afa nsunsuansoɔ a amenatuo no de bebrɛ yɛn kwae, mmoadoma, nneɛma binom atenae, yɛn tebea mu ne nsupa nya
ɛsɛ sɛ saa nhwehwɛmu a ɛfa abrabɔ ne atenae mu nsɛm ho no ka yɛn adwemfa dwumadie ho
GIADEC nsɛm kyerɛ sɛ wasusu nsiesiekwan ahodoɔ ne kwan a wobɛfa so de nkrataa akyerɛ.
Na saa nkrataa yi ɛwɔ abɔntene ɛnna temanmufoɔ bɛtumi anya ayɛ akorankorɛ nhwehwemu wɔ ho ɔɛ anaa?
Ankorankorɛ adwumayɔkuo fa bi no wɔbɔ wɔn kokɔ.IUɔN nhyehyɛe sɛ wɔde bɛsiesie abɔ nkwaeɛ ho ban 087 wɔ ɔbubuo mu wɔ 2020 mu a ɛkyerɛ sɛ mma wɔntu agudeɛ wɔ Atiwa forest sɛseɛ alominion biara mfiri hɔ mma.
Atewa Kuromafoɔ a, wɔdwene Atewa kuro ho aka asi nketee sɛ wɔmpene mma nwumakuo ahodoɔ a wɔtu fɔm agudie nwura Atiwa Kwaeɛ no mu nkɔseɛ wɔn agudie, wɔn nsuo ne deɛ ɔde tena ase
Temanmufoɔ agye wɔn nsusueɛ no ato mu afoa so de kɔkɔbɔ akɔma akorankorɛ nwumakuo a wɔn pɛ ne sɛ wobetu agudeɛ wɔ Atewa kwaeɛ no mu no.
Nwumakuo a wɔde alominion de dwuma no nnye alominion a wɔde bauxite a wɔtu no Atewa yɛ no nto mu.
Enti sɛ GIADEC pɛ sɛ ɔkyerɛ wɔn anibere wɔ deɛ woreka no ho a, ɛneɛ na ɛsɛ sɛ bauxite nko ara na wɔntu no wɔ Atewa kwaeɛ no mu.
Mmom GIADEC ayɛ ade pa baako, ɛna sɛ, w’aboa abɔ ɛfam agudietuo a ɛmfa mmara kwan so ne sɛdeɛ wɔresɛe Atiwa kwaeɛbiretuo no ho dawuro a wɔrekyerɛ sɛ, sɛ yɛbɛsɔre dakoro na kwaeɛ biara nni hɔ.
ɔivil soɔiety nso aka saa asɛm korɔ no ara mperɛ bebree
Ɛsɛ sɛ aban nwumakuo nketewa no kyerɛ wɔn haw a wɔwɔ wɔ sɛe a yɛresɛe aban nsaase a ɛmfa mmara kwan so no ne nsunsuansoɔ bɔne a ɛde bɛbrɛ Ghanafoɔ.
Enni sɛ Temanmufoɔ no ne Aban nwumakuo ahodoɔ no ko sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ na wɔbenya agudie ho mfasoɔ daadaa anaa Aban ne ne nwumakuo bɛhyɛdq ama kwan ama wasɛe ɔman yi kwaebiretuo de akyɛre sɛ anka yɛde tuu agudie mpo koraa nka ɛyɛ anaa?
ɔhaw a GIADEC ahu no bɛgye nsam berɛ a yɛrentu bauxite no: ɛkwan a yebeyi wɔ Kwaeɛ no mu no bɛma mmeaeɛ a akanee na nnipa ntumi nkɔ na w’atumi akɔ
Agudietuo a ɛmfa mmara kwan so ne nnua twitwa a yɛhu no nnɛ yi bɛkɔso paa wɔ beaeɛ a yɛabɔ ho ban berɛ KO a GIADEC amma kwan
Seesei ara no yɛwɔ dɔdeɛ ahodoɔ wɔ Atewa kwae no mu a ɛbɛtumi de mfasoɔ bebree abrɛ ɔman no mu nnipa nyinaa na ama wɔn adi yie
Yɛsrɛ GIADEC sɛ wɔne yɛn bɛdi nsawɔsoɔ ama yɛatumi ada nnoɔma pa adi de abɛboa Ghanaman nnɛ ne ɔkyena no.
Nsuo adwumakuo a ɛwɔ ɔman Ghana mu fa a ɛwɔ apueɛ fa mu ka sɛ galamseyfoɔ no mmoa mma nsuosɛm nkɔ nkan.
Seesei, aban nsuo adwuma no twitwa nsuo dodoɔ a wɔde kokɔ amantam ahodoɔ no mu na wɔsane toto nsuo mu wɔ mmeaeɛ bi te sɛ Osino, Bunso ɛnna Kyebi ne nyinaa firi agudetuo a ɛmfa kwan pa soɔ.
ɛnnɛ a ewiase nyinaa ɛrekae nsuo a Ghana ka ho no, ɔman yi mu apueɛ fam nsuo adwumakuo kasamafoɔ Owura Kwadwo Daase wɔ awerɛhyɛ mu sɛ yɛwɔ kwan a yɛbɛtumi de asi galamsey ano a ɛnha wɔn adwuma koraa.
ɔhaw a ɛwɔ nsutuo ne kwan a nnipa bɛnya nsuo wɔ babiara wɔ berɛ a wiase di nsuo afedida yi ne beaeɛ a nsuo firi ba te sɛ nsuwansuwa ne sɛdeɛ galamsey asi anya nsunsuansoɔ wɔ soɔ no.
Aberɛ biara a yɛbedi wiase nsuo afedida yi nka deɛ yɛ pɛ ne sɛ nka yɛnnka saa ɔhaw yi eguso rekɔ so wɔ mmea bi te sɛ Osino ne Bunso ne deɛ ɛkeka ho ho asɛm.
Mpem pii no gye sɛ yɛto nsuo mu wɔ hɔ
Afei ɔsane de nkotosrɛ too wɔn a wɔte saa mmeaeɛmmeaeɛ yi sɛ wɔne nsuo adwumakuo bɛyɛ koro wɔ wɔn nhyehyɛeɛ biara mu de som ɔmanfoɔ
ɔkaa sɛ wɔntumi nya nsuo a nkorɔfoɔ wɔwɔ a Koforidua, Somanya ne Odumasi ne nkuro a ɛkeka ho. COVID-19 berɛ yi ne sɛdeɛ nnipa hia sɛ wɔde nsuo di dwuma ama nsuo ho ɔpɛ no akɔ sore.
Yɛatrɛtrɛ yɛ nsukorabea kakra no mu sɛdeɛ yɛbetumi de kakra a yɛwɔ no adi dwuma, ne saa nti na yɛrebɔ mmɔden de nnoɔma agu akwan mu wɔ nsuo yi nhehyɛea ho; wɔ aberaa yɛde nsuo rekokɔ mmeammea ahodoɔ wɔ nna mmienu biara akyi no na saa kwan yi aboa paa ara.Na yɛtaa nya kwadu firi nkuro ahodoɔ mu sɛ bɛyɛ nawɔtwe mmienu ne mmiensa yɛnyaa nsuo no saa nhyehyɛeɛ yi aboa papaapa
Wɔ ɔpɛpɔn bosome mu wɔ 2021mu. Owura Kwadwo Daase de adesrɛdeɛ too aban no anim sɛ wɔnhwɛ mmere galamsey foɔ ne akwanyifoɔ nwuma ɛreha wɔn nwuma ase.
GWCL no ntumi nyɛ hwee sɛ ɔbɛto Kyebi nsukorabea no mu ɛsane anwea dodoɔ a galamsey foɔ a wɔwɔ Birim ho de aba nsuo no ho no.
Soafoɔ a wɔayi no sɛ ɔmmɛhwɛ nsaase, abɔdeɛmunyansapɛ, mfidie ne mpontuo so a wɔnya ntoo ne so aba, Dr. Kwaku Afriyie ahyehyɛ kwan soronko bi a ɛbɛboa ama yɛatumi asɔ agudietuo a ɛmfa mmara kwan soɔ ano
ɔrekasa wɔ bere a yɛretoto n’ano no, Dr. Afriyie kyerɛɛ sɛ berɛ a ɔman no hyɛɛ aseɛ de mfidie akɛseɛ tutu agudie wɔ afe 1989 na Ghana nsaase sɛeɛ hyɛɛ aseɛ
ɔkaa sɛ, Ghana bɛtoto ne mfidie a wɔde tutu fam ho asɛm yie
Dr. Afrieyie kyerɛɛ sɛ yɛbɛtumi asi ɔhaw no ano kwan berɛ a yɛrehu mfidie a wɔde tutu fam no nyinaa ano na wɔasi ne dwumadie ano kwan.
ɔkyerɛɛ sɛ yɛkan mfidie a wɔde tutu fam a ɛwɔ ɔman no mu nyinaa na yɛnsi ba a ɛba ɔman yi mu no ano kwan
ɔsan ka kaa ho sɛ, yɛmfa bi ngu dan mu, yɛntɔn bi na yɛmfa ɔhyɛ nto bi so na yɛnte ebi ahoɔden so na yɛnnya deɛ yɛde bɛtu fɔm agudie.
Nea wɔapaw no nso kaa ɔhaw bɔne a “ɔhamfan “ ahodoɔ a yɛde hohoro agudie wɔ nsuo mu de ba a ɛwɔ sɛ yɛ de yɛde ɔhyɛ no ne ba no so.
ɛwɔ sɛ yɛma mfidie ahodoɔ a yɛde hohoro nneɛma wɔ nsuo mu a ɛnni krataa a yɛagye atom tia mmara ɛfiri sɛ wonim sɛ saa mfidie yi na wɔde tu “galamsey” wɔ nsuo mu.
Bio, ɔsane kaa sɛ, ɛnɛ Ghanafoɔ nni tumi wɔ ɛfam agudie so, ɛne sɛ ɛwɔ sɛ yɛde mmara to ɛfam agudie a yɛtuo ho.
